dcterms:title: SIR JOHN McLEAVY BROWN ON KOREA
dcterms:abstract: At a lecture delivered before the China Society, held in Caxton Hall, London, last month, Sir John McLeavy Brown spoke at some length upon his experiences in Korea.Sir John is reported as having delivered a long and interesting speech without having recourse to notes, and this will probably account for what we may describe as the “scrappiness” of his discourse.Naturally enough, his reminiscenses were fragmentary, and his comments upon recent and current affairs could not be taken “au pied de la lettre” any more than they could be regarded as a full expression of everything he thought and of everything that had taken place during his sojourn in the East. Temperament had something to do with Sir John’s grievances against the Koreans; active and energetic as he was, he had little patience with the temporising methods which finds so much favour in this country. He deplored the readiness of Koreans to borrow money, and regarded their aggrieved attitude when asked to return it, as a national characteristic. So it is, but in order to do full justice to the Koreans, Sir John should have explained more fully the patriarchal conditions under which the country had prospered for many centuries before foreign ideas introduced themselves. A Korean of the ordinary class “retires” when he owns a house and a son who is able to support him. Unless he is a miser or is without issue he seldom attempts to provide for his old age. The same system prevails in China and Japan. Any one becoming more than ordinarily wealthy is visited by hordes of unsuspected solicitous and importunate relations. All of these ask for loans and bread is thus cast upon the waters. The rich man is none too optimistic about the return of his wealth but still he persists in calling the transaction a loan, and could as a matter of fact go and live on any one of his debtors if he chose.Later on in his speech Sir John expressed a very heterodox opinion. We may consider ourselves now upon solid ground, because, no matter how fragmentary reminiscenses may be and how necessarily brief his glance at recent history is, his opinions have behind them the weight not only of published and unpublished facts but a score of years of mature judgment.Sir John said:-“They could not but regret that the people had lost their independence, because it was rather a unique country in its way, different altogether from either Japan or China. It had now gone, however, he was afraid, and, of course, the sooner it now became a part of Japan the better for the Koreans. It was now being kept too much a dependency. If it were incorporated and the people had all the privileges of Japanese subjects, he thought it would be much better for the Koreans. He was told that relations were much improving.”We are not sure whether we ought not to ascribe Sir John’s suggestion to the desire inate in the hearts of all Irishmen to see “wigs upon the green;” or we may take another long shot and hazard the guess that he thinks that the acquisition of an “Irish situation” would have a chastening effect upon the Japanese Government. In any case, his suggestion that Japan should incorporate Korea, is quite out of the range of practical politics ; for the Koreans do not want to be incorporated and Japan does not want to incorporate them. The majority of the Koreans, even now enjoy greater liberty than the average Japanese; and the taste they have already had of Japanese rule, is not likely to lead for a desire for more. On the other hand, it is not to be imagined for a moment that the Japanese would care to have their Diet consist of thirty per cent of Korean representative. That this is the best way out of the present chaotic situation which presents itself to an Administrator of the experience and capacity of Sir John Mc. Leavy Brown, is evidence that affairs in Korea are in a most unsatisfactory condition: Regarding the Japanese occupation as an accepted fact, he is only able to propose as a palliative, a measure unacceptable to both nations, and impossible of execution. All who have thought upon the subject have been driven to voice similar Utopian suggestions. As a matter of fact, if the present situation be taken as a starting point, the finishing point cannot even be guessed at. Three years of mistaken policy have to be wiped out before any cooperation of the two nations can be expected as the basis for conditions demanding mutual friendship and confidence

dcterms:title: ALARMING INCIDENT AT SINGAPORE
dcterms:abstract: An alarming incident, which might have caused the death of Sergt Major Morris, S.V.C., but which fortunately had no serious result, occurred at the S. V. C. Drill Hall, Singapore, soon after nine o’clock on the morning of the 6th instant; and, remarks the “Straits Times,” only the merest chance averted a tragedy. The previous evening, a member of the Volunteer Engineers forwarded to the Drill Hall Hall a double-barrelled sporting rifle, with a covering note to the armourer stating that the rifle was jammed and was loaded in the left barrel, and asking that it might be attended to. There was no European present and the loaded rifle was taken charge of by the native armourer, who cannot read English and presumably could not have been aware that the rifle was loaded. Next morning, one of the Drill Hall employes was handling the weapon at the Armourer's bench which is at the sea end of the building, when the rifle went off. The heavy bullet-sufficiently massive to deal destruction to an elephant-struck the floor about half way up the hall, deflected upwards slightly and passed through the wooden screen and open door of the Sergeant-Major’s front office, and passed out through a pane of glass in the front window-finishing np nobody knows where. The Sergeant-Major was in the office, but chance ordained that he had not actually sat down at his desk, which he was about to do. Nor had the Chinese clerk. Looking through the hole bored in the screen, one could see that both Sergeant-Major Morris and his assistant, if they had been sitiing at their desks, would have been in the direct track of the bullet. A “tamby,” who was in the neighbourhood of the office, had his coat torn in two places and received a scratch on the side, these evidently having been caused by splinters, of which there were several lying about

After thus exterminating the O´s the governor appropriated the site of their house and built a vault on it for his future grave. After the Japan-China war the two remaining heirs of O brought suit against Cho before the supreme court in Seoul. The court ordered the governor of the province to make a thorough investigation of the charge. The governor´s report corroborated with the statements made by the complainants. The court restored the property to the lawful heirs and made Mr. Cho pay an indemnity of $10,000 for the murder of the eight persons. After Mr. Cho became minister of law he last time ordered the present governor to imprison the two remaining O´s and compelled them to give up the property. The two persecuted O´s are now suffering cold and hunger in the provincial prison of Kongju. It was a lucky day for Korea when Mr. Cho stepped out of the Law Department

dcterms:title: EX-EMPRESS EUGENIE ON THE WAR
dcterms:abstract: EX-EMPRESS EUGENIE ON THE WAR.The ex-Empress Eugenie has been giving her impressions of the Spanish American war to a newspaper representative in Paris. There is a very pathetic interest in the opening sentences of her statement in which she says:?I ◈ake a sorrowful interest in all wars, for war has been to me my most cruel foe. It robbed me of my empire, of my son, and, I may also say, of my husband.\" Her Majesty continues:?\"The Spanish American war is cruelly interesting to me, for Spain is the land of my birth, and the United States was visited by my husband, the Emperor, where he received many courtesies. I would stop this war if I could, for doubtless the problem can be solved without further bloodshed on the part of two great people who ought to be friendly. I know little of the political exigencies which brought about this war, for my life is in the past. But all humanity is one. It is the privilege and the duty of woman to discourage needless suffering. My people are a brave race. They would now display their bravery in declaring for peace as they have shown it thus far in prosecuting the war. The women of Spain encourage the men to deeds of valour. The nation´s reputation for bravery is interwoven with the history of more than a thousand years. If now peace were proposed it would be an act of moral courage, and no one would dare accuse Spain of cowardice.\"?Ex

dcterms:abstract: 官報○敍任及辭令○十月二十一日神岡一亨 君塚영 三郞 久德隆篤 任慈惠醫院醫員敍奏任官三等 △岩本宗治 反町周馬 北村良康 任慈惠醫院醫員敍奏任官四等○十月二十三日任財務監督局事務官敍奏任官三等 松崎俊造○十一月六日任郡主事敍判任官五等 崔檍○十一月十一日任大韓醫院醫官敍勅任官三等 森安連吉 △任蔚珍郡守敍奏任官四等 內部主事 權純九 △任豐德郡守敍奏任官四等 前參奉 兪斌兼 △任漣川郡守敍奏任官四等 郡主事 崔祺集 △任慈仁郡守敍奏任官四等 警部 洪昌燮 △任度支部主事敍判任官三等 前主事 李敬植官立漢城高等女學校學監 赤穗千春 依願免本官(十月三十日內閣) △仁同郡守 李益采 道事務官 秦煕晟 依願免本官 △免本官 長城郡守 金潤昌右 全羅南道觀察使 申應煕의 報告書 據 즉 該員이 暴徒에게 被害 人民에게 御下賜신 救恤金을 他에 轉用야 本人에게 交附 愆期고 又他人의 委托品을 不當 高價로 强賣야 其金額을 私用에 消費고 郡守公私用의 薪炭費及紙代라 稱고 人民으로붓터 不法의 徵收 行얏슴과 如은 實로 職權을 無視 貪汚의 行爲라 云치 아니치 못 者라  바 此 査 즉 該員이 官紀 紊亂고 威權을 失墜 行爲가 若是 즉 不可仍寘이기 是以로 免本官(以上十一月十一日內閣) △命鰲川郡在勤(以上十一月六日內部) 郡主事 崔檍 △齊藤知三 印刷局事務에 囑託홈 (勅任待遇)(十月三十一日度支部) △谷武松 臨時財産整理局事務을 囑託홈 (奏任待遇)(十一月九日度支部)

dcterms:title: GROPING AND GRUMBLING
dcterms:abstract: GROPING AND GRUMBLING.Clubs, mass meetings, popular clamors for various things- what does all this mean? Koreans are groping in darkness if haply they might find some light that would lead them out of the present wretchedness. They used to look to the government for guidance and protection. Bnt the vacillating between supine indifference on one hand and unreasonable trepidation on the other, never daring to introduce reforms, however necessary, against the wishes of the Sovereign, and over trying to find some outside power to rely upon, the Government has failed, miserably failed, in discharging the sacred duties entrusted to its care. In the mean while the trend of events in the Far East clearly indicates that unless Korea could purge her Government of its proverbial corruption ; save her millious from their crushing oppression and prove, in some measure, to the world, her fitness for existence, the number of her national life is counted.Compelled by these considerations, the people, more or less enlightened, have come to the conclusion that they must urge the Government to do what it would not or dare not attempt of its own accord?namely the initiation and enforcement of certain reformatory measures that may, however imperfect they be, in time secure to the suffering multitudes of this unfortunate land the simple blessings of safety of life and property. Hence the meetings, the agitations, the clamors, the agonies of the Independents and their sympathizers.No doubt this sign of popular life is very hateful to a few interested persons whose selfish ends can be best promoted by the uncomplaining, servile submission of the people. Yet this popular agitation is welcome whether it hastens the ruin or augurs the salvation of the country. If the former?if Korea is doomed to death?try such remedies as they are able to administer. If the letter?if we are destined to a better fate?the Independents are benefactors of the country for having introduced grumbling which an English writer has called the \"must valuable and important, nay, the most sacred of all duties and privileges of a freebora B◈ten.\" Most heartily do we endorse the statement that \"it is a sorely degraded and spiritless people that cannot grumble.\"\"Wherever there is grumbling there is hope,\" and even our chronic pessimism inclines to discover some hope for Korean in the grumbling of the people. Grumble on then!

dcterms:title: 派在日本國留學生柳承欽等이 政府에 上書
dcterms:abstract: 派在日本國留學生柳承欽等이 政府에 上書 全文이 如左니伏以物有彼與我오며 事有公與私이옴 生等도 卽我二千萬國民中一分子로셔 旣許身國家而應命派遣오나 離親戚棄故里옵고 出於萬里之海外야 喫盡無限之苦而已經三載之星霜者 但在誓成一業야或期將來於彼此公私間一助矣이옴 生等之所竊有至寃至鬱者 不在於情之私而卽在於事之公이오며 不在於彼之不公而卽在於我或有私이외다 留學生五十人中에 修築於日本東京府立第一즁學校者가 四十人이온昨年十一月分에 暫有四窼之闕而其時에 以敎育上問題로 有感情於該校야 所謂同盟退校者가 卽三十六人이온바 前例兼監督駐日公使趙民煕氏가 屢次交涉于日本政府及外務省야使之各從目的入學케란 面約結果로 現監督韓致愈氏가 隨各目的及學力야 可以專門者 專門고 可以즁學者 즁學으로 交送公文而各得入學와 自來熱心做業而期圖報我 皇上命派聖旨之萬一이읍더니 不意今二月分에 學政參與官幣原坦氏가 同我大使完順君一行而渡日時에 初以使入于師範附屬즁學校之意로 言之야 以示親切之情이더니 未幾에 有何意見야 招見生等고 原無一言之說明而輒謂汝等이 不遵兩政府命令故로 廢止學費라고 宣言而歸이온즉伏念生等이 當初派遣도 卽我政府에셔 奉承勅命而選拔者也이옵고 到今學資도 亦自我 皇室費즁劃下而政府로셔 支給者也이옵고 退學時에 我政府代表之公使에게 呈請願書 後退校出舍얏고 同公使가 日本外務省과 從目的入學케 面約時에 日本文部大臣署理總理大臣桂太郞氏와 統監矦爵伊藤博文氏도 共爲妥議決定者也이옴인즉 不遵命令도 無거니와 生等의 學費 以參與官口傅으로 廢止라옴은不爲深信이얏더니 無何에 果自我學部로 有學費不支撥之電訓이기 生等이 各自落漠와 或有鳴寃次歸國者오며 或有榮慟而期於成業者오며 又有無奈而乞復該校者이더니未完

dcterms:title: 度支部令 第二號
dcterms:abstract: 別報◎度支部令 第二號舊白銅貨交換處理順序第一條 舊白銅貨의 交換을 請求고져  者 休日外 每日上午九時로 正午十二時內에 舊白銅貨를 交換所에 持來미 可홈第二條 舊白銅貨 二百五十元又 五百元마다 堅牢 櫃에 盛야 持來이 可홈 但 此에 未充數 堅牢 櫃나 囊袋에 盛야 其表面에 個數를 示明미 可홈第三條 舊白銅貨의 個數 交換所에셔 計筭 바에 依홈第四條 交換을 請求 交換所에 備置 附屬書式第一號의 請求書에 居住 姓名과 請求年月日 舊白銅貨個數와 盛器個數를 記入야 舊白銅貨와 共히 呈出미 可홈第五條 請求書에 舊白銅貨를 添야 交換을 請求 者가 有 時 接受所掌은 此를 接受야 計筭所掌에게 送交미 可홈第六條 計筭所掌은 請求書의 到着次序를 依야 號數를 記入야 甲號와 乙號間에 符印을 押 後 此에 記載 事項을 登記야 請求書에 附屬 任置票에 符印을 押 後 此를 切斷야 請求者에게 交付미 可홈第七條 計筭所掌은 前條의 順序를 經 後 請求書의 甲號와 乙號를 切斷야 乙號 舊白銅貨와 共히 鑑定所掌에게 送交미 可홈 但 舊白銅貨에 請求書의 號數及盛器의 個數를 示明 牌를 付미 可홈第八條 鑑定所掌은 舊白銅貨를 受 時 鑑定人으로 此를 鑑定케 야 甲種及乙種을 各기 囊袋에 盛納야 此에 請求書의 號數와 盛器個數를 示明 牌를 付야 倉庫所掌에게 交付미 可홈第九條 鑑定所掌은 乙號請求書에 鑑定의 結果와 白銅貨의 個數와 盛器의 個數及號數를 記入야 此를 計筭所掌에게 送付미 可홈第十條 鑑定所掌이 其受納 舊白銅貨中 其日內에 鑑定을 終了치 아니 者 有 時 假使 此를 倉庫所掌에게 越交야 翌日 更히 倉庫所掌의셔 此를 受納야 前載順序를 依야 鑑定미 可홈第十一條 前條 鑑定을 終了치 아니 舊白銅貨를 倉庫所掌에게 越交 時에 此에 伴 乙號請求書 此를 計筭所掌에게 送付야 翌日 鑑定케 을 際야 更히 此를 受納미 可홈計筭所掌이 前項의 送付를 受 時 此를 倉庫所掌에게 權交 舊白銅貨에 對照미 可홈第十二條 計筭所掌이 鑑定所掌으로셔 鑑定를 畢 舊白銅貨에 對 乙號請求書를 領受 時 此를 甲號와 對照야 成蹟欄에 交付미 可 代金에 額을 記入야 成蹟欄記錄 事項을 登記야 請求者에게 任置票와 互替고 附屬書式第二號의 支撥票를 交付미 可홈第十三條 支撥票의 交付 正午十二時붓터 下午四時內로 限홈第十四條 計筭所掌이 支撥票를 交付 時 此를 倉庫所掌에게 通知야 此에 對 舊白銅貨 各種마다 各其 備置 囊袋에 盛納케 야 此에 封印을 施야 他者로 混同치 아니도록 保管케 미 可홈 光武九年六月二十四日

dcterms:title: 家屋田土保險
dcterms:abstract: ●家屋田土保險 慶北觀察使申泰休氏가 大邱居前同敦寧郭柱祥과 前都事李善炯請願書를 據야 度支部에 報告되 家屋者 人之依居也오 田畓者 人之資生也라 其於民業에 顧不重且大乎이 現今列邦則有曰行政法也、國家法也、國際法也、區域制治法也、井井有條然後에 至成保險証券야 無相錯雜矣오 我韓則制治之法이 視古漸弛야 每於田畓家屋을 或被勢力侵奪며 或爲僞券盜賣야 大有妨於生命財產니 孰不慨歎哉아 本人等이 爲是之懼야 創立保險一社고 謀所以實施而若無認則有難施措故로 玆以規定一度를 帖聯仰籲오니 查照後特爲認許시고 轉報于京司야 俾得訓飭야 亟圖實施케라온바 近來家屋田畓을 成給保擔券야 永成條約야 以防奸獘則其於一省之生民財產上에 大關便利故로 該規程을 左開仰報오니 特軫生民保險之美舉야 認許發訓시와 以副輿論야 務圖實施케라얏더라    家屋田畓保險會社章程一本會社 大邱府下에 設立고 各郡에 支社를 繼次擴張 事一本社 遠近名譽人을 組織되 社中主務員은 社長総務會計掌貨事務員이오一本社創設事務監督은 伊藤恒藏氏로 囑托擔任 事一社員의 資本金은 一株十元式이오 株數多寡 勿拘 事一人民이 自己의 家屋田畓을 本社에 保險을 要 時에 本社에 請願고 家屋間數와 田畓斗落과 所在地名을 開錄야 舊券과 可憑 文蹟을 提呈 事一保險准許金은 草家每間一錢瓦家每間二錢田每斗落五分畓一斗落에 二錢式으로 定 事一家屋이나 田畓을 保險准許 後에 或其親屬이나 又或他人이 僞券盜賣或典執橫奪等獘를 遭 時에 本會社에셔 卞正야 危險을 免고 永永完全기를 擔任지오 家屋의 燒燼堆壓等患과 田畓의 潰缺或陳廢等危險은 不爲擔任 事一保險准許를 受 家屋田畓을 該主가 發賣時에 本社에 請願야 現金額百分一을 本社에 納 後에 賣買를 認許 事一保險을 受 家屋田畓은 該主가 典執코져나 本社에 認許가 無면 不得 事一資本金과 准許金은 本社에셔 掌貨員을 擇定야 附近銀行에 貯蓄取殖 事

dcterms:title: A RELIC OF BARBARISM
dcterms:abstract: A RELIC OF BARBARISM.The practice of flogging is a relic of barbarism. It is a curse to any land which hopes to travel a path of civilized life. It is twice cursed; it curseth him who gives and him who receives. It found its origin in dark times and the darkness which filled the minds of men in those days finds its counterpart in minds which countenance the practice to-day. Flogging has been customary in the case of slaves―those who had no rights,―and children, who must be taught to choose the right from the wrong.The practice of flogging public officials is tolerated only by nations yet laboring under the dark skies of medieval ages. It not only classes them with slaves and children but it robs them of all of the prerogatives of men. It not only disgraces them personally but it disgraces the service to which they belong. A business that employs men to better qualified than children or men having no more rights than slaves is one not to be tolerated in these days. A service which punishes its servants in such a way makes itself liable to such a challenge.When public men ― especially high officials―are sentenced to be flogged it is a dishonor to all who have had business of state with them. No diplomat of dignity can mingle socially with men who are at any moment liable to be treated either as children or slaves. It is beneath the dignity of the potentates and the imperial realms which they represent to associated officially with either those who do not know right from wrong or who have no rights. Men who are liable to this charge must be classed as such.It has always seemed a difficult question how to punish high officials for misdemeanors in official matters. But the world now separates their crimes into two classes, the acts of which are of a traitorous or dishonest character and those which result from incompetency. As punishment for the former crime a stern military law is provided. For the latter no punishment can, in reason, be afflicted. It is less a dishonor to the incompetent official than to those who placed him in such a position. There is at present in one of the great governments, a man serving in one of the highest posts who is thoroughly incompetent to perform his duties because of age. The blame rests entirely upon the chief magistrate who called such a man int◈ service so late in life. But for the latter´s actions no punishment can fellow among a civilized people. Perhaps the most heinous crimes in history have been committed against men occupying high official positions through anger or revenge. But that time is past and the moral civilized spirit of this age precludes punishment save in cases of dishonesty and treachery. Upon these the heaviest punishement is laid.Among the more civilized nations there goes with high official positions a great measure of responsibility not unlike that of royalty itself. To men in such stations there comes a dignity which compels carnestness and great consideration. Among such there is seldom great error and it is rare that incompetency appears. When it does the removal of the offender is a matter of great disgrace and is a royal rebuke which usually is the severest punishment which could be meted out.In states less highly developed this grave responsibility of power is less felt and a removal from office is less a disgrace than a circumstance of ill-fortune. Among such it seems necessary to have a punishment which can be felt if the more removal from office is no disgrace.Thus it seems all a matter of education. Where the responsibility and great honor of high official position is not appreciated it seems that a punishment for official misdemeanors must be found in some way. Where offices are given and taken at a whim and where there is felt neither the majesty of high service nor the responsibility of opportunity, there can be expected no enlightened methods of punishing officials.And so―in this as with many other things―we can only hope for the coming of still more enlightened views, for a civilization which is not coerced but one which is born in a revolt from the despair and corruption which ignorance brings.But for the present it is to be hoped that in the case of Korea, the flogging of officials with whom respectable people have to associate will be abolished. This will be one step in the right direction

dcterms:title: 商業會近況
dcterms:abstract: 京城商業會議所에셔 五萬圓事로 燥燥이 지다 말은 日前報에 揭載여거니와 其裡許를 詳聞즉 去九年分財政整理時에 商業界에셔 卒地에 恐황을 當여 十에 八九가 或逃躱或破産 鍾路實業家가 適其時商業會議所를 組織고 萬商이 會同여 政府에 哀訴얏이더니 自內로 入聞 皇上陛下오셔 內帑금五萬元을 貸下시 万商이 셩恩을 感泣며 略略分排여 于今二週年이 되엿대 月前에 經理院에셔 該會議所任員를 招諭曰該金五萬圓을 今有還納之 勅令니 從速辦納하라 지라 該任員答曰貸下金五萬圜을 尙今未納와 有此下詢之境오니 伏不勝惶悚万万이오며 至今事勢가 現金은 果難變通이옵고 其時分排人票紙를 納上則該商民等이 恐황之餘痕이 未合여 僅僅扶持이오니 該金을 何可辦納乎이가 千萬洞諒 似此民情으로 稟達于 天陛시고 限二箇年만 加寬여 쥬옵소셔 엿더니 院卿曰詳聞裡許니 理勢然矣라 入稟後當通知矣리니 退待가 可也라 더니 其後에 更招命令曰該金之貸下가 年已久矣라 今不可加寬也니 從近辦納하라 거날 該所總代答曰商民之事勢 向已詳白이오나 別無更達이오니 惟待處分而已로소이다 院卿曰實無變通之道矣라 該金納然後라야 可免逢變矣려니 諒處之라  總代曰셩恩을 진不奉答오니 何敢遁罪리오 然이나 所白民情之無奈何 果非飾詐오니 伏望處分라 얏다더라

dcterms:title: 孀婦三怨
dcterms:abstract: 寄          書  孀婦三怨      嫠憂生◎請我一般人은 試聽孀婦之來歷哉어다 古昔聖王之爲政에 鰥寡孤獨이 是爲四窮인 老而無妻曰鰥이오 老而無夫曰寡라니 由是觀之면 盖有白髮之寡고 從無靑年之孀이니 若有靑孀이면 仁政所恤에 靑孀이 其不先於老寡乎아 噫라 古今幾千年에 盖無我國之孀婦也오 東西幾百國에 盖無我國之嫆婦也니 悲乎我國之孀婦여 始自何時오昔我成廟  朝時에 何許儒臣이 奏請改嫁子孫을 勿許淸宦야 特定國典더니 自後仕宦之族이 只恐銓曹翰閣에 一路枳塞고 不念深閨冷枕에 百年苦况야 使此紅顏少艾로 生爲恨人에 死爲冤鬼니 作俑之禍가 不其深哉아 是知我國之孀婦가 非其心이 獨烈於他國也오 非其節이 獨堅於古人也라 拘之深閨之中에 不許鄰里之往來고 或有謀圖改適者면 一器死藥이 已隨其後야 暮夜無知에 溘然遂瞑니 嗚乎라 靑紫金玉이 便是膏盲之痼疾이오 淸班華族이 皆是頑忍之種子니 國民前途를 實可喟然이로다南唐徐温이 滅楊行密之家고 其兄弟姊妹를 幷囚一獄터니 歲久年深에 自相爲配偶호 後世君子가 未甞非楊家之淫蒸고 但罵徐氏之慘酷이어 况乎我國孀女之拘鎻가 無異牢獄되 帷薄之醜와 穿窬之行이 相繼不絕야深夜橋下에 棄擲新生之兒고 有時毒藥에 斷送在腹之胎야 乳虎가 不來에 後日之良相이 浪死於澤中며 精氣가 未凝에 許多之英材가 凘盡於毒手니 興念到此에 豈非毛骨之悚然者歟아周世宗之后가 是再醮之婦로 後世史官이 不咎其毀節而穪其德하니 是知婦人之改嫁가 不足爲罪也며 子思之母가 雖是改適이나 不累子思之聖하니 是知改嫁者之子孫이 不足爲疵也며 其他改嫁之婦人으로 生得英豪之子孫者를 不可勝數오 如范仲淹、韓琦、富弻之賢은 却是同腹之異姓으로 爲宋賢相하야 傳爲今古之美談하고 至如我國之鄭忠信은 本以累嫁賤婢之子로 又遭當年에 崇尙門閥之時하야 建不世之功에 爲  國朝之名臣하니 然則一時苛法을 鳥足爲萬世不刋之典也리오異哉라 我人之頑迷也여 昔日에 爲此仕宦之道하야 施此慘毒之手段하니 其事則雖慘이나 其計則猶可라 吾無㪅論이어니와 今日에 是將求淸宦美職之意歟아 是將守士夫兩班之名歟아 叅之事理에도 不可하고 揣之人情에도 不然커날 空然將無罪之女子하야 拘之繫之에 困之虐之하니 彼不足恤이어니와 汝亦何益고觀爾一家면 怨女曠夫에 易致和氣之蕭索과 醜聲之頻數이오 觀諸一國면 鰥男寡女가 易至巷曲之相招에 淫風之頓盛이니 以此로 認之百年之美俗이 不其誤歟아貞烈之婦 此亦愚生之屈膝面崇拜者로 强之而使爲淫奔도 固所不可오 强之而使爲貞烈도 亦所不可라 黃河之流를 不順其性면 愈防愈决니 人情所至를 苟欲防之인 豈不難於防河哉아 與其拘之於室而反釀其中篝之醜行으론 孰如快除防限에 隨其情願이며 與其御之太苛而反成其踰墻之賤行으론 孰如亟行觧放에 任其行止리오 嗚乎라 貞烈孀婦가 百人에 難得一人이오 千人에 不能一人이라 若果有之 於是乎褒之奬之에 施以旌異之典이어 今此拘囚貞姬와 壓制烈女 縱使充滿於國中이라도 旣無補於風化之美고 反有如此之巨弊어 奈之何因循習慣에 不知釋放之眞理니 試問許多孀婦에 願爲貞烈之女者ㅣ果有幾人耶아况此時 何時也오 世界大陸에 梯航이 相通야 習慣之美惡에 人種之盛縮이 係焉니 若守迂滯之惡慣에 不思變革면 滅種之禍가 安知不在此歟아 日昨閣下之論에 上有貞烈之母라야 下有忠孝之子라니 愚於此言에 尤不覺啞然大笑也로다 豈閣下가 故爲此言에 欲試愚生之言論歟아 不然이면 豈其迂濶之至此哉아 貞烈孀婦가 有何奇法에 生得忠孝之子리오 貞烈貞烈이여 貽禍全國者 必此言也로다 且日昨之書에 反以禮法學士의 攘臂弩目에 衆論朋起로 爲리 憂生寒心이라나리 憂生은 却又以全國孀婦의 銷骨之毀와 鑠金之怨이 皆集於閣下리니 斯又奈何오 大丈夫立言之地에 豈爲他人之是非야 或有一歩退却이리오만은 若曰他人有言을 亦可畏也 學士之論과 孀婦之怨이 果孰衆孰寡며 孰深孰淺고 伏惟閣下 無執偏見며 毋循流俗고 以公正之筆로 裁之以公正야 導風化於文明고 針錮習於野味야 一團春風和氣가 融暢於全國케이 是리 憂生之리 憂也로라

dcterms:title: With all the wars and rumors of war on the docket, last year was a thirsty year for
dcterms:abstract: HERE AND THERE.With all the wars and rumors of war on the docket, last year was a thirsty year for the United Kingdom. According to the Times the drink bill for ‘97 was ￡3,500,000 greater than for ´96 and averaged ￡3,16◈0d for each man, woman and child. We are reminded by this of the woman, a notorious drunkard, whose descendants to the number of 858 have been traced by the German government as an example of the law of heredity. They have cost the German government $1,129,000 in jails, almshouses and courts ; or $1,500 each. Who can estimate the cost to the British government of merely this excess of ‘97 over ´96, to say nothing of the grand total?

dcterms:title: 日昨에 從二品 康洪大氏가 西北沿邊에 外兵과 匪徒가 侵越을 憂慮하야
dcterms:abstract: 別報◎日昨에 從二品 康洪大氏가 西北沿邊에 外兵과 匪徒가 侵越을 憂慮하야 上疏하얏다 은 已報하얏거니와 今其全文을 錄載如左하노니伏以國有艱虞臣思圖報 卽古今之通義也 況臣以蟣蝨微品 樗櫟冗材 猥荷 殊恩濫廁緋金之列 感激孤衷思效犬馬之誠而祇恨才短識淺居常踧踖 霣越靡容矣 竊伏見今日時局則艱危溢目 岌嶪萬狀者 不可一一枚陳 而現今外國之人 恃其强力 藉其威勢 蹂躙恐喝 日甚一日 如電社軍艦 不過一個商業所係而以此張大 致惹國際之紛紜 脅迫侮辱無所不至 擧國臣民孰不痛恨且奮也 然而此等事件 猶小小葛藤而已 自當有妥辦之日 至若異日無窮之患者 乃西北沿邊森林一欵也盖俄人之經略滿洲 固非一朝一夕之故 而其樹權殖力 去益滋蔓 尤其關係之密切者 卽我西北兩沿之地也 西北兩沿 自扶餘濊貊渤海契丹靺鞨女眞蒙古哈丹野人以來 世爲邊患 侵軼彊土 無代無之矣 我大祖高皇帝北拓六鎭 西置四郡 長江天塹限截南北 而設置鎭堡 防禦關阨者 靡不用極矣 自淸世祖起於盛京以後 劃定彊界 各自保守 邊圉寧謐 鎭堡息肩 關塞之無事者垂二百有餘年矣 邊備之嚴 因是而稍懈 鎭堡廢置 關防踈忽誠極矣當此之際 俄人以數萬重兵 屯紮於烏蘇哩渾春 及鳳凰城安東縣等地大抵此地與我彊土 隔一衣帶水 未必有駐兵之緊要 而俄人以重兵留屯者 其意何居也 今藉託森林之保護 許多俄兵 亦已闖越鴨江 來駐龍浦 則豆滿鴨綠上下沿江數千里之地 所在森林 皆云保護 一例來駐之患 亦難保必無也 設或俄兵未必有來駐之事 彼餉馬匪賊之勦掠邊郡 連年爲患者 以滿洲爲其巢穴 日後如滿洲遼海之間 一朝有事 兵連禍結 則彼無厭匪黨 陸續侵入 乃事勢之必然也 若爾則東眞哈丹之禍 恐亦難免 而使聖祖龍興之地 國家豊沛之鄕 必被搶攘騷亂之毒 而俄人又必藉口於保護 移兵來駐 如拳匪之際 侵占滿洲則亦將何以禦之也 此豈非究於幾先而防於未然者乎 臣雖愚昧無狀 以此憂慮 火奮成疾 與一二紳士講究籌度 思欲肝腦塗地 以酬聖恩之萬一 而竊伏念臣本生長北土粗諳邊境事情 請以所覩所聞者陳之 伏願垂察焉 盖國朝設備陰雨 戒嚴管鑰者 未甞暫忘於西北兩邊故沿江設鎭 當阨築砦 項背相望 首尾相應 殆若常山率然之勢 而每一里置一堡 堡置二砲 十里置一寨寨置十砲 堡有堡長 寨有寨長 而又隨其地形之方便 五十里或百里置一鎭 鎭有鎭將 統轄堡寨之長而賊來則吹角爲號 各堡之兵 附近之民 一時俱起 相救並禦故賊不敢侵越 我民之有犯越者 堡長必砲斃之然後 具報寨長 寨長報鎭將 以次申聞故 民亦不敢於越界 此其防邊之大略也 一自愼堡之廢置 賊來無可禦之道 民越乏防制之權 雖有◈靑鍾城◈地方鎭隊之兵 皆在距邊四五百里 或千餘里之遠 長鞭不及 震雷莫暇 實無益於防邊之術也爲今之計 宜復設鎭堡舊制 凡西北沿邊諸郡 踏査舊址 設置堡寨鎭壘招募山砲 把守編隊 其措置方略一依舊制而參酌磨鍊 令各該郡統轄之 又沿江上下最要之地 別設防禦營 以爲戰守之備則 匪徒敵兵雖欲輕易侵犯 其勢末由矣 盖西北之人 號稱勁悍 而山砲之手又皆嫺熟於砲槍弓馬之技 擧多驍健勇敢若以洋銃倭砲之精利器具 數年試用 無不一以當百 實爲天下莫强之兵也 又具生長此土 凡於山川險阻程途遠邇 及彼匪防制之術 無不周知詳悉 筋膽已固 決非東南諸路之兵 所可等比者也 且其調餉之道莫便於屯田 凡六鎭諸郡 土極膄沃地多閒曠 雖曰 氣候早寒 不宜稻粱其黍粟豆麥蕎麥秫蜀等雜糓 靡不皆宜 悉令兵卒 開墾屯田 給牛耕作 廣興農作之利 兼開牧畜之場春夏耕農 秋冬蒐獵 以資其衣食之方 不過幾年 足食足兵 十萬之衆不勞而可養矣 西北兩邊高枕而無虞矣 此實防◈之長策而禦寇之良法也 亟宜採用施行 以弭北門之憂實今日之急務也 雖然其建置設立之際 若或任非其人 措置失當 則反滋騷擾之獘矣 此又不可不熟慮者也 臣玆敢不避猥越 覼縷仰瀆於紸纊之下 伏乞聖明留神澄◈ 亟賜採納焉則 國家幸甚臣民幸甚 臣無任激切屛營祈懇之至 謹昧死以聞 光武七年六月十五日奉 批旨省疏具悉 疏辭 令政府稟處하라 하셧더라

dcterms:title: 쟉일 독립협회 샹쇼쵸본
dcterms:abstract: ● 쟉일 독립협회 샹쇼쵸본업여 써되 신등이 쟉일에 업여죠칙을 익고 비로소 황늠오며 즁간에 우탄오며 만에 분통격졀 와 피 흔 눈물이 잠연히 나리도 소이다 신민이 되 각히 뎡 분의를 직히와 혹 위월이 업옴은 다린 셰샹에 덧덧 도리라 혹 방고 빗기로 가 일이 잇와 탕탕히 방한이 업 디경에 이르온즉 진실노 법과 형별에 용기 어려온바오니 신등이 에 가득히 황늠옴이 이로소이다 비록 그러 오 이졔폐하의 셩덕으로 써 진실노 두 어진 신하가 쟝 그 아름다옴을 슌히야 써 편안이 다림을 일운즉 신등이 다만 당히 집을 직히여 업을 편안이야 써 강구(康衢)의 노를 오일 이어늘 도라보건 이 여러 의론이 비등(沸騰)야 써 이제날 이런일을 일움이 엇지 신등의 본심에 고져  바오릿가 신등이 에 가득히 우탄바 이로소이다 오호라 뎌 물니침을 입은 모든 신하의 무리가 아유구용 으로 젼히 옹폐을 일삼아 안으로 셩의 으로 여곰 분울케 고 밧그로 리웃 나라로 여곰 엿보게 야 졍를  쟝졍을 직희지 안이고 송를 들음 법률을 직희지 안이오니 이쳔만 인구 구렁에 매일 이 잇고 삼쳔리 강토 외 치 난홀 걱졍이 잇기로 신등이 쳐소를 나 회오며 샹소를 밧치옴 궐문에 업여 오니 그 을 궁구 오면 단단히 츙 졍셩에 거늘 물니침을 입은 모든 신하의 물이가 뎌의 죄 당히 뉘웃침은 각지 안이고 오즉 탄을 봄을 원슈로 삼아 낫하게 아가며 감안이 계 공교히 구함을 일삼아 이에 신등으로 써 졍와 법령을 평론며 벼 츌쳑 참예다 오며 대신을 협박야 탕탕히 방한이 업다 이르와 횡(恣橫)다 방해롭다 말노 써 모라내고졔 거늘폐하오셔 그릇 이런 무리의 침윤(浸潤) 것을 미드시고 이러엄 죠칙이 문득 나리시오니폐하오셔 엇지 와 아참것은 깃버오시고 바른 말 것은 미워 오릿가 이 신등이 써 분통격졀 온바에 피흔 눈물노 써 이음이로 쇼이다 만일 외국 경계로 써 말오면 허다 민회가 잇와 졍부 대신이 졍  과실이 잇온즉 젼국에 포유야 여러 셩을 회집와 질문도며 론도와 셩이 불복면 감히 가지 안이치 못 니 이러 온즉 외국 민회가 엇지 강론고  근칠이릿가 도라보건 우리나라 협회 독립으로  긔쵸를 삼아오며 츙로 써 목뎍을 삼으은바황태 뎐하오셔 하탕(下帤)와 도으시오며 독립관이라 을 써 붓쳣오니 이 로 셜시이 안이오라 실노 공인(公認)이로쇼이다 슬푸온지라 져 모든 신하의 무리가 영화만 탐고 죽엄치 벼에 잇셔 함묵으로 써 능를 삼고 혹 일이개 직언 션가 잇셔 그 이에 인즉 긔틀을 타 감안이 쏘와 쳑야 죳친후에 말아 ■샤로 야곰 누란(累卵)의 위이 잇고 령으로 여곰 도탄의 이 잇오니 신등이 비록 감히 말으로 써죄을 엇더 사이 죽온즉 열 사이 이어 죽오며 열 사이 죽오면  사이 이어 죽오리니 죽오면 죵로 더부러 함 영화가 되오며 죽온즉 도라가션왕의 하날에 계시온 신령을 모시와 길이 텬하만셰에 말이 잇게 겟오너 이 신등이 이졔날 오른 무가 쳘뎡(鐵定)와 밧고지 못을 이로소이다 만일 권리로 써 의론 오면 텬로 브터 셔인지 이르히 각히 뎡 권리가 잇온지라 륙쥬(六洲)에 평등와 만국에 평옵기폐하의 권리고폐하의 셩이 되와폐하의 을 즉히옴 졍을 어긋지게고 법을 어지러이  신하가 잇셔죵를 해롭게 이 잇온즉 탄며 셩토  신등의 권리거늘 말 들이 이이르기를 민권이 셩즉군권이 반다시 덜닌다 오니 사의 무식이 뉘가 이에셔 심오릿가 만일 이젼날에 셩의 의론이 업온즉 졍치와 법률이 무너지고 덜니와 무슨 모양 화 긔틀이 어느에 이러날줄을 아지 못오니폐하오셔 호을노 이를 각지 안이 오신닛가 신등은 츙분소격에 회포가 잇오면 문득 베프오니 다만 간졀히 황송와 몸 둘바를 아지 못 이다 업여 원건셩명은 찰 소셔비지 셩쇼 구실 거듭 말이 비록 근심고 사랑 나온듯 나 신측도 고 돈유도 얏거늘 맛 물너가지 안이 것이 맛치 명을 거역 것 갓니 이 엇지 도리리오 말 길을 열고 란(責難)고 진보(進步)것은 임의 뎡산이 잇스니 다 알고 물너가 기리고 다시 번거이 말나 오시다이십일일 밤에 리신죠칙

dcterms:title: 一進演說
dcterms:abstract: ●一進演說  日昨一進會에셔 獨立舘에 開會고 演說이 如左니  時勢之進運      辯士洪肯燮氏時勢之進運에 現機以來已四十餘年而丙寅分에 爲始야 至十許年丙子에 始定通商之例얏스니 故로 四十餘年云也노라 當初我邦이 本不知時勢之名目야 變通進步를 未觧矣러니 近來에 漸知時勢之進運如何이라가 昨年日俄開仗以後에야 快知其由니 其時에 若日本이 不勝露兵이면 决無今日東洋平和矣리니 其証이 在何오면 今日에 此演說臺를 創立고 有此大開演說會ㅣ라 惟我同胞 熟思深究홈 四千年疆土와 五百年宗社를 享年이 多라 惟諸公이 未見古木이 年久則自朽之由乎아 蠧虫이 食根고 喙木이 壞之야 雖有良春之和風甘雨에도 葉踈花殘이라 若去蠧虫逐喙木고 㪅爲培栽면 源氣後生야 葉盛花繁也니 如此古木이라도 漸培漸植면 自然靄密成蔭야 花香葉陰之中에 奇禽仁獸가 自然群集矣리니 大抵此時勢之進運이 猶木之栽培而養也라 若個人之時勢로 言之라 若逢不好면 問諸蓍龜야 避凶取吉也人之常情也ㅣ라 大凡國之時勢造運인들 豈不然也哉아 人有先失後에 還推之心이 孰不無之리오 如此岌嶪之時에 徒費心力고 無究進運故로 甚至於隣邦이 有指導之方針야 至有統監來莅얏스니 此已失之權利를 速進則速推하고 緩進則緩推 理之常이라 惟諸公은 深究熟思之하오 現今港誼閭說이 無非推托依賴와 希望人之補助之力이요 不務自家血誠進步하니 豈不惜哉오 大抵時勢之進運이 如是已耳라 歲月이 流邁하야 又當今春之開此說塲하고 復見前日諸君顏面則亦知進運之如何耳라 前日傍聽諸君이 我會員外에 皆着網衣白衣러니 今日喪人外에 理髮衣黑이 漸多하니 於此可感하노라 世界人이 目之하되 有髮之人을 歸之於野蠻國이라하니 何必受人賤待가 可乎아 縱有剃髮之心이라도 不合於頭着之件이라하니 大抵着頭之物은 無定法이라 掩頭則而已니 惟同胞諸君은 熱心進步於時勢變遷하야 共圖克復을 務望

dcterms:title: 宮廷錄事
dcterms:abstract: 官報  抄錄  號外    十月三十一日●(宮廷錄事)詔曰挽近以來章程定焉律令次焉雖有古今之不同亦足爲一王之制苟使政府諸臣實心踐行何至巷議之沸騰乎朕甚慨然玆將民國事宜之爲今日急務者開列於後佈告中外惟爾臣隣懍遵毋忽用副朕求治之至意一諫官廢止後言路壅滯上下無勸勉警勵之意亟定中樞院章程以爲實施事一各項規則旣有一定各會與新聞亦不可無防限會規令議政府中樞院叅酌時宜裁定新聞條例令內部農商工部依倣各國例裁定施行事一觀察使以下地方官及地方隊長官等無論現任與已遞若有乾沒公貨者依臟律施行騙奪民財者這這推給本主後按律懲勘事一御史視察等員之作獘者許令本土人民赴訴于內部法部以爲査究懲治事一設立商工學校以勸民業事光武二年十月三十日    議政府叅政  朴定陽議政府叅政臣朴定陽等謹奏本月二十九日人民等大會于鍾街稱以官民共同會謂有國獘民瘼可以議袪者要政府諸臣一同赴會臣等窃伏念官民協商雖係創有人民等旣以議袪國獘民瘼爲辞則職在政府理難排却相率往會矣會中人民有六條綱領獻議者萬口齊聲一辭唱可且要臣等將此上奏臣等又伏念該六條乃尊國軆整財政平法律遵章程之事也俱係合行故謹將該摺本左開奏聞伏候聖裁    光武二年十月三十日奉旨令政府措處                    臣朴    贊政法部大臣臣徐正淳    贊            政臣李鍾健    贊政宮內府大臣臣閔丙奭    贊政農商工部大臣臣金明圭    贊政學部大臣臣李道宰    贊政度支部大臣署理臣高永喜    叅              賛臣權在衡一外國人에게 依附안이고 官民이 同心合力야 專制皇權을 堅固케 事一礦山鐵道煤炭森林及借欵借兵과 凡政府與外國人約條事 若非各部大臣과 中樞院議長이 合同着啣捺印則不得施行事一全國財政은 毋論某稅고 幷自度支部로 句管되 他府部와 私會社 毋得干涉고 豫筭决筭을 人民에게 公布 事一自今爲始야 凡干重大罪犯을 叧行公辦되 被告가 到底說明야 究竟自服後施行事一勅任官은大皇帝陛下게셔  諮詢政府사 從其過半數야 任命事一實踐章程事

dcterms:title: 俄國極東統制의 改革
dcterms:abstract: ⊙俄國極東統制의 改革俄國이 旅順會議結果로 滿洲統制에 一大改革을 行지라 俄國政府에셔 去七月十二日에 詔勅으로써 黑龍江沿道總督府管內와 關東省을 合倂야 俄領東亞細亞大總督廳設置난 件을 裁可公佈고 且關東省總督 아렉시후 大將으로 大總督을 任얏난 其權限을 如左히 規定얏스니 (一) 大總督은 各省의 管轄을 不受고 其委任 管內總行政上의 諸權을 信任고 且滿洲鐵道와 利害를 有 各地方及大總督廳管下에 在 俄國臣民의 安寧秩序을 維持기 爲야 臨時措置을 施行 事 (二) 東亞大總督의 行政權에 關 條例를 頒布기지 其權限責任 等은 千八百四十五年十月三十日에 頒布 勅令을 依고 高加索大總督의 制度를 準야 大總督에 屬 各官廳及官吏난 總督을 經由치 아니면 其所屬官部와 直接으로 交涉을 不得 事 (三) 隣國과 交涉난 外交事務난 總히 東亞大總督이 統轄 事 (四) 大總督은 大平洋艦隊와 其管轄內軍隊의 總指揮官을 委任 事 (五) 東亞大總督과 中央政府의 意見을 一致켸 기 爲야 元老院에셔 適當 쥴노 認난 委員으로써 特別 委員會를 創設 事 (六) 今番 大總督을 任命 아렉시후 侍從大將으로 야곰 其授與 命令을 遂行고 且大總督管內行政規則의 編製을 委任되 此等 諸法案은 豫先認可를 受 事라 此난 卽아렉시후 將軍으로 야곰 本國政府로셔 獨立야 滿洲의 陸海軍司法行政의 任務와 極東外交를 統轄켸 이니 아렉시후 將軍이 到今야난 本國의 平和論者에게 掣肘됨이 無고 侵略主義를 恣意實行기에 至 俄國의 極東政策은 맛참 侵略主義로 決定이라 何人이 尙今 支那保全門戶開放을 說난지 俄國의 此政策을 打破치 아니면 畢竟 東洋의 平和를 維持치 못너라

dcterms:title: 宮廷錄事
dcterms:abstract: 官  報●宮廷錄事  秘書院郞李義國書  奏臣於陰曆十月三十日亥時量敬奉  聖諭馳往傅諭于領敦寧院事沈舜澤中樞院議長趙秉世進伏處則以爲臣等之今此討逆寔出於大同之公憤而罪犯瀆撓  嚴旨乃降惶懔之極罔知攸措此罪人之逆節旣著自有當律在臣等討逆之義不得請則不能止矣責諭之下不敢晏然進伏而亦不敢偃然還第今方退伏私處恭俟  允兪之音云矣敢  奏  答曰知道秘書院郞李義國書  奏臣於陰曆十月三十日亥時量敬奉  聖諭馳往傳諭于議政府議政尹容善進伏處則以爲義急討逆罪犯瀆撓聖恩寛大不治臣罪辭旨肅溫俾臣等各還第感懼交集而此罪人未伏常刑之前無往非冐悚待勘之日矣  責諭之下不敢晏然進伏而亦不敢偃然還第今方退伏私處恭俟兪音云矣敢奏  答曰知道議政府議政尹容善等討逆箚  批旨省箚具悉卿等之懇前此之批申複爲言者寧不諒會而有是乖當之擧誠已過等又復至此煩瀆者未可喩也夫豈惜一李容翊故爲靳持也不無商量而然而亦當有處分矣卿等其還第事遣史官傳諭○領敦寧院事沈舜澤中樞院議長趙秉世等討逆箚  批旨省箚具悉卿等之懇公論自公論也軆貌自軆貌也論一李容翊至於此擧者卿等不謂過當歟朕未知其十分爲可矣當有處分卿等其還第事遺史官傳諭○宮內府大臣臨時署理尹定求等討逆疏  批旨省疏具悉已諭於政府之奏大臣聯箚之批矣不必至此張大事遣府郞宣諭    以上十一月二十九日

dcterms:title: 隆煕三年 貳月拾三日 官報
dcterms:abstract: 部令 (續)第五條 煙艸稅 每年左開의 期에 徵收壹 煙艸耕作稅 拾壹月壹 煙艸販賣稅 壹月第六條 準牌 受 者 準牌料金 拾錢을 納付이 可準牌의 再交付를 受 時도 亦同第七條 準牌 店前其他易見處에 恒常揭榜이 可第八條 財務官吏 煙艸耕作地 又 煙艸販賣業者의 店舖에 向人야 訊問 又 檢査을 得第九條 免許 受치 아니고 烟艸 耕作며 又 烟草의 販賣를  者 壹圓以上貳十圜以下의 罰金에 處第拾條 煙草耕作者 又 烟草販賣者가 第一條 又 第四條의 種別을 詐欺고 其他不正의 行爲에 因야 脫稅거나 或은 脫稅코 하 時 其金額의 二倍에 相當 罰金에 處第十壹條 前二條에 該當 者에 對하야 脫稅에 係 稅金은 納期에 不拘고 卽時 徵收을 得第拾二條 煙艸耕作者 又 煙艸販賣業者 財務官吏의 職務執行을 拒逆거나 此에 拘碍를 加 時 貳圜以上二十圓以下에 罰金에 處하되 其刑法大全에 正條가 有 者 該規程에 依附則本法은 隆煕三年分으로부터 此를 施行但隆煕三年分烟草販賣稅 免許의 際에 此를 徵收本法施行前으로부터 繼續야 烟艸를 耕作거나 又 烟艸販賣業을 營던 者 本法公布日부터 九十日以內에 本法에 依야 免許 受이 可 [完]

dcterms:title: One of the strangest marriages on record is
dcterms:abstract: One of the strangest marriages on record is reported from Boston, Mass; Capt. Conasi, of the Italian Navy, marrying Miss Jane Leland, an American heiress, The Captain was in attendant on the Duke of the Abruzzi during his memorable visit to the United States. He was introduced to the lady at a reception. He knew no English, and she was ignorant of Italian. By chance he mede a remark in Japanese. To his astonishment the lady replied in the same language. Explanations followed. He had been stationed at Japan. She had lived there with her father for some three years. Each for love-making abandoned the natural tongue, and Japanese took the place of Esperanto；at least so says a Paris contemporary

dcterms:title: THE IMPERIAL CHINESE FUNERAL
dcterms:abstract: The Chinese Board of War instructed Colonel Wang, Chief of Staff of the First Division and Commander of the First Regiment, to meet H. H. Prince Fushimi at the railway station with two companies of troops, carrying the Regimental colours, on the, occasion of his arrival at Peking. Representative authorities in Tientsin, who have been conferring with the Peking Government, left Tientsin for Chinwantao, where the Imperial Japanese Envoy was expected. An elaborate plan of welcome and entertainment was prepared by the Chinese Government for the Imperial Japanese guest

dcterms:title: A CENSUS OF THE EARTH
dcterms:abstract: A CENSUS OF THE EARTH.The enormous difficulty of the taking of a census of the world´s inhabitants which it is proposed to publish in 1901, becomes apparent when one considers that at least two-thirds and perhaps three-quarters of the inhabitants of our planet dwell in lands none of which have yet been fully civilised and many of which still remain in a condition of savagery. Yet the purpose is, according of the London Daily Mail, as far as possible, to include in the enumeration every human being on whom the sun rises on a particular day in the year 1900. Explorers and census takers are to be sent to every attainable point on the globe for the purpose. Such is the scheme. It looks impracticable. An attempt has recently been made to take a complete census of Russia and this will aid his tour in Europe Li Hong-chang became interested in the proposal census of the world, and, it is asserted, promised his cooperation and assistance in the work.China forms the greatest factor of uncertainty in estimating the population of the globe. Estimates of the number of inhabitants in China vary sometimes by 100,000,000, and even the population of the chief cities can only be guessed at. So, too, Africa presenting an enormous field of mysteries and difficulties. Estimates of its population are constantly come upon knots and centres of populations the real extent of which is unknown. The most careful statistician admit that their estimates of the population of Africa may be as much as 50,000,000 out of it. West of India are the vast lands that Alexander overran in his conquest?Afghanistan, Persia and Turkey in Asia. How many scores of millions may they not contain? Many of the uplands of Persia are practically unknown to the civilised world, but they can support a great population. No one knows how many people Arabia contains. Nobody knows how many Eskimo tin re are dwelling in the lands of eternal ice that encircle the North Pole; many of the islands of the vast Pacific swarm with inhabitants living on the open bounty of nature, whose free and careless life captivated the imagination of highly educated men like Robert Louis Stevenson, and when the census is completed, if it proves practicable, what will it probably show the total of the globe to be??Ex

dcterms:title: The Finance Department was on the 2nd inst. authorized by the Council of State
dcterms:abstract: DEPARTMENTAL NEWS.The Finance Department was on the 2nd inst. authorized by the Council of State to pay from the Reserve Fund the following items of expenditure :Sacrificial Expenses $8,345.00Six new drains for the late Empress´ grave $1,068.24Supplementary funeral expenses for the late Prince and Princess of Tai-won $17,996.13Building expenses for the New Palace $43,122.51For transporting money to and from the treasury $100,000.00Repairing barracks for the Guard $630.48Stamping machines and workmen $1,663.00For 44 students in Japan $1,125.00Dies for silver and copper coins for the mint $148,700.00For 2 offers and 21 non commissioned officers studying in Japan $1,125.00Banqueting expenses in the Foreign Office $2,000.60

dcterms:title: 義兵四起
dcterms:abstract: ▲全北來信을 據則 雲峯郡박鳳陽의 部下 河東郡砲軍을 募集야 慶상道統營의  火藥庫를 襲取고 智異山의 入據야 岳陽남原等地에 義兵과 呼應허야 擧事 計劃이라 허고▲二십日午前着忠州電을 據즉  京城線電信工事를 保護기 爲하야 出張 忠州守備隊六名은 呂州로붓터 長湖院歸路에 義兵이 襲擊하야 苦戰얏대 新히 派遣 日隊의 來援을 依허여 艱辛이 歸去허 卜馬三匹은 奪取허고 馬夫一名은 被害허고 長湖院남方約一里間에 電柱二십餘箇가 絶倒허엿고▲日本旅團副官의 電報을 據則 日偵察隊가 십六日道欺里에 着허엿 平昌에 在 約三百名義兵은 今朝에 寧越方面으로 向허고 又십二日頃에 平昌에 來到 約三百名韓兵은 二道를 分허여 一部 酒泉으로 向허고 一部 寗越로 向지라 同夜에 平昌에셔 日兵은 宿營허고 將校斥侯 芳林驛方面으로 來到허엿스니 必是江陵派遣隊下士斥候로 遭遇허여 連絡 勢가 有허고 同地의 在 義兵은 約三百名이 追到허여 섭五日의 平昌으로 向허고 義兵의 根據 道欺里以남과 寗越堤川附近의 在허고 偵察隊 십九日의 退却허엿고▲淸風郡日人報道 據則 八月십二日의 堤川方面에셔 義兵五十餘名이 淸風郡에 來到허야 分派所와 郡衙를 襲擊고 郡守 對허야 砲士를 募集허고 軍을 出給허기를 請求 郡守가 應諾허고 日人을 捕拿허야 北倉洞으로 出發허엿 銃器와 彈藥은 多數히 携帶허고 原州兵丁과 合勢허고 堤川은 根據地을 삼앗대 其數爻 不明허고 각동居民이 日益來附허고 軍需를 來助다 허고▲忠州郡長湖院地方의 在 義兵情況에 關 日人에 報告를 據즉  義兵約二百名은 八月十四日午後七時에 日人에게 相闕된 韓人家屋을 습擊허야 財物을 奪取허고 同地에 在 日人八名은 同日에 安城방面으로 逃走허고 義兵은 陰城郡黃금山금礦役夫을 集合허야 同地를 습擊허고 銃器五十柄을 携帶허고 長法院을 근據地을 을 貌樣이라 허고▲各地方이 騷動 中에 斷髮令이 頒布되 京城에 附近人民도 格例를 反對허고 各地方에 人民도 非常히 反抗 情態가 有 貌樣이라더라

dcterms:title: 勅令
dcterms:abstract: ○勅令  朕이 學部官制改正에 關 件을 裁可야 玆에 頒布케노라  隆熙元年十二月十三日勅令第五十四號    學部官制第一條  學部大臣은 敎育學藝에 關  事務 管理홈第二條  大臣官房에셔 各部官制通  에 揭 者外에 敎育上의 褒賞에 關  事務 掌홈第三條  學部에 左開二局을 置홈    學務局        編輯局第四條  學務局에셔 左開事務 掌  홈  一  師範敎育에 關 事項  二  普通敎育及幼稚園에 關 事項  三  實業敎育及專門敎育에 關 事      項  四  各種學校에 關 事項  五  敎員檢定과 許狀에 關 事項  六  通俗敎育과 敎育會에 關 事項  七  學校衛生과 學校建築에 關 事      項  八  外國留學生에 關 事項  九  敎育費補助에 關 事項第五條  編輯局에셔 左開事務 掌  홈  一  圖書編輯飜譯及出版에 關 事      項  二  圖書給與及發賣에 關 事項  三  敎科用圖書檢定에 關 事項  四  曆書에 關 事項第六條  學部書記官은 專任七人으로  홈 第七條  學部事務官은 專任四人으로  홈第入條  學部에 技師專任三人을 置  되 奏任으로홈  技師 上官의 命을 承야 技術을 掌  홈第九條  學部飜譯官은 專任二人으로  홈第十條  學部主事 專任二十八人으  로홈第十一條  學部에 技手專任六人을 置  되 判任으로홈  技手 上官의 指揮 承야 技術에  從事홈第十二條  圖書編輯과 檢定기 爲  야 豫筭範圍內에셔 委員을 置을 得  홈    附  則第十三條  本令은 隆熙二年一月一日  로붓터 施行홈第十四條  光武九年勅令第二十二號  學部官制와 同年勅令第二十四號觀  象所官制 廢止홈

dcterms:title: 근일에 졍을 맛흐 쳔단이 외고 (外雇)를주엇오며 만일
dcterms:abstract: 別報  (젼호련쇽)근일에 졍을 맛흐 쳔단이 외고 (外雇)를주엇오며 만일 이왕  일노 의론온즉 군부관을 쵸오 슌젼이 ●만 쎠오며 경무로 잇올에 도젹 증집을 등한 일노 알어 연곡(輦轂) 졀발(窃發)이 편안이 싈 날이 업오니 이 신등이 평일에 민영긔를 의심 바로쇼이다 특히 이졔대신이 오 근시대 잇와 봉영(逢迎)대 공교온지라 일노써폐하셔 밋어샤 의심치 안이 오시고 도로여 신등을 가공(架空) 에 의심 오시니 이 신등이 궐문을 직히여 머리를 두다리 신등이 불너가지 못일이 두가지오며셩비에 오시기를 법률은 죠가의 를 안야 당을 짓것이라 오시니 크오신 왕의 말이여  말에 죡히 나라를 흥케신다 옴이 이셩비를 뵈고 일옴인지 대범 죄인을 로륙지 안이은 문왕의 어질미오 근일 셔양 법률에 합홈이라폐하의 춍명예지 오심으로 독립 즁흥신 운을 당샤 진한(秦漢)의 가학 률을 씨스사고 요슌의 인셩신 법을 회복샤 로 더브러 합당케 시며 가히 오쥬에 보통케 오실 것이어늘 엇지 로륙쟈 말이 져의 기를 진츙토적다 오나 실샹은 진한의 포학으로 써 우리님군을 졉 이로쇼이다 셩호에 기를 우리님군이 능히 못리라 이를 역적이라 셧스니 져의가폐하를 진한(秦漢)으로 긔약이폐하를 능히 못실가 의심이 안이닛가 이러 물이로써 의관 반렬에 두어 졍를 의론오면 안으로 능히 젼셩의 다림을 르지 못옵고 밧그로 린국의 슈치를 변쳐 못 터이오니 이런 물이 의관들은 당히 멀니 구양을 보내시고 임의 뎡 신 법을 요치 말으샤 지인 오신셩덕이 짐누심이 업게 시쇼셔 이 신등이 궐문을 직히여 멀이를 두다려 물너가지 못일이 셰가지이다셩비에 오시기를 쳔단이 의론다 옵심은 신등이 도망기 어려온 죄샹이오나 옥가 방쟝온 긴증을 죽이려  엇지 오릿가 죵샤가 위고 령이 곤 오 신등이 졍를 의론고 법률을 의론이 능히 마지 못이로소이다 업여 각건 텬디가 간젹오면 비(否)가 되옵고 텬긔 하강고 디긔 샹 등오면 태(泰)가 되니 군도와 민졍의 이가 통고 막히믈 인야 비태를 판단 을지라 폐하의 지인 오심으로 뭇기를 죠와시고 살피기를 죠와 시 통쵹지 안임이 업오나 다만 죠뎡신하의 응● 바 되샤군도 샹항(上亢)시고 민이 하울(下鬱)와 통태 긔쵸로 비 디경이 되오니 엇지 통곡 류쳬 이을릿가 복걸셩명은 연연(淵然)히 깁히 살피사 급히 일곱 신화를 치사고 즉일에 공졍심심 신하 나를 보내오샤 신등의 업온 에 일은즉 신등이 에는 말 고져 나 샹쇼에 다 베푸지 못 것을 당히 낫낫치 알외여 민졍은 우흐로 통고황은 아로 나리게 하겟오니 복걸셩명은 수찰 옵쇼셔 엿더니 곳비지를 나리셧 ● ●오●기●●●● ●●●● 량듸 나 과즁이 괴이치 안이나 그러나 진실노 구비을 망코져 진 그러 사이 드물지라 짐이 바야흐로 다림을 구 급야 죠셔를 뎡신(廷臣)의게 나려 여곰 그 경쳑케 엿스니 젼 허물을 거의 곳치고 오 효험을 가히 기다릴지니 그리 알고 물너가 다시 변독지 말나 오시다   (완)십월십일 독립협회 삼소초본신등이 어제 거듭 츄설(蒭說)을 알외와전량오심을 바라온바 츙군 소적에 번독●● 피치 안이온바 바야흐로 식●(●●)와 ●●의 위엄을 기다리더니셩도가 여틴시와 기만 안이 나리심이 안이오라 도로혀 우악(優渥)오신비지를 나리오시니 환변오며 감읍 이다 믈며 죠뎡에 나리신륜음이 의가 간졀시와 비록 나무와 돌과 도야지와 고기 치 우미 것이라도 죡히 감동와 오 겟오니 이 요뎐우모(堯典禹謨)와 문무(文武)의 훈(訓)이시라인군이 이오 엇지 셩이 보젼치 못 오며 나라가 다리지 못을 근오릿가 마 져 심슌 윤용션 리슌 심상훈 민영긔 신긔션 리인두 등이 나아가 능히 그 아름다옴을 드날니지 못고 다만 아쳠야 이쳔만젹로 여곰 젼련호호(顚連呼號)와 도탄에 지게 오니 비록 금일 비등(●騰)의론이 안이라도 이 벼히시고 귀신이 죽임이 리치에 반닷겟오나 다만 죵샤의 위태과 령의  이 목젼의 잇오니 이 신등의 큰 소로 니 불너 샹소를 련와 근치고 물너갈쥴을 아지 못이다 셩지에 오시기들 진실노 구비을 망코져면 그런 사이 드물다 오시고  죠셔를 뎡신의게 나려 여곰 각히 것쳑게 엿스니 관허물을 거의 곳치고 오 효혐을 가히 기다릴지라 오시고  죠셔야 오사 만일 쥰슌각고(浚巡却顧)야 도젼유(再●前●)면 ●유상●(●有常●)니 단무관셔(斷無寬恕)라 오시니 신등이 우러러폐하의 쳘명오심을 혀아리 온즉 임의 일곱신하의 그름이 만야 관셔기 어려올쥴은아시오나 특히폐한의 함흥광대오신 셩덕으로 가라치시고 일오시며 이뎨면명(耳提面命)샤 허믈을 곳치게 시오며 효험을 기다리옵시니 이 텬디 호신은이오나 일오고 가라쳐 여곰 신케 옴이 이 적은 허믈을 두고 이이옵거늘   (미완)

dcterms:title: 世界無類의 珍寶(續)
dcterms:abstract: ●世界無類의 珍寶  （續）  日本京都鹿谷에셔 禪宗으로 著名  던 徵法師의 言을 據건 該法師가  일즉 日本셔 刋行 大藏經（日本  慶▣宗鐵服禪師가 宋本을 模倣重刋   者인 該本은 即支那에셔 穪  바 南本이니 實로 支那大藏經中에가  장 粗笨 本이라）을 讀習다가 脫  誤▣이 有가 疑訝야 建仁寺에 所  藏▣麗本에 就야 自手로 証正을  加고 鹿谷의 藏本을 補入寫定야  二百餘部를 增分 二拾餘年의 光  陰을 消야 始乃唯一無二 大藏經  校本을 成얏스니 其事業이 亦히 奇  偉도다 大抵高麗藏本의 內容이 豐  富은 余가 亦是貝葉院縮本을 閱覽  다가 始乃得知얏스니 其梗槪를  舉야 論건 喇麻의 經典은 他藏  經에 遺漏不載얏 獨히 高麗  藏本에 収記얏고 且廣畧二部로  分얏슨즉 此로 推면 高麗藏本의  豐富 內容을 可見지로다（日本  縮藏은 傳敎弘法等精來의 本을 兼収  야 亦極浩瀚니 喇麻의 大白傘盖  、秘密儀軌本과 太和長谷寺秘本의  類를 縮藏에 収錄얏고 高麗本에   遺漏얏스니 是 縮藏이 高麗本  의 未収 者를 収도 有）以上으로 觀건 高麗藏本이 世界佛典中에 實質이 優良야 古今無類됨을 可히 指證지라 今에 日本의 縮藏을 將야 其實質을 比較면 収入의 豐富은 縮藏으로 或優타지나 萬若其脫誤를 校証면 自然의 脫誤가 甚多야 南本의 粗笨 者리도 尙且不及바이 有거든 何况高麗本의 後塵을엇지 仰望리오 其實質의 優良이 如此니 是以로 高麗와 藏經을 藏有면 世界無類의 珍籍을 藏有얏다 穪야도 過言이아니라 日本셔 所藏 高麗藏經은 東京에 增▣寺가 有고 西京에 建仁寺가 有며 其他에도 二處藏經所가「今忘其寺名」有니 日本에 此珍籍을 藏有은 四處이로다  日史足利氏의 所言에 京城口碑를 據  즉 日本人鄭萬人이란 者이 朝鮮太  祖大王을 爲야 漢陽城을 築야 功  成 後一物의 報酬를 不受고오  大藏經을 請受而歸얏다며 又對  馬島에 殘缺 高麗大藏經이 存在  얏슨즉 像想컨 日本에 傳 高麗藏  經이 四本에만 止치아닐지라    按漢陽築城에 有功 者 無學大    師오 鄭萬人의 說을 挽近俚巷風說    에 不過즉 此 日史의 傳會 者    라                  （未完）

dcterms:title: 김락긔 샹소 (젼호연속)
dcterms:abstract: 잡보김락긔 샹소 (젼호연속)특별히 그우 야 닷지 못 을 민망히 넉이샤거동 지 셔셔    은혜로 친유 신 디경지 니고 한 뎌희 고져  바이 벼에 잇슴을    각 셔셔 특별이 십여인 의관을 허락 셧스니 진실노 일반분 텬부지셩이 잇스면 맛당히 감샤야 울며 귀화 야   은혜 갑기를 결을치 못터인 더욱   무마 시 더욱   횡 고 더욱 춍시 더욱교만야 대관으로 여금 샤진을 못게고 아 관원들노 시무를 못게야 졍부가 일시에 뷔게고 심지어 대신을 방쟈히 쳔거 며 경무를부르 디경에 니며 혹 죠곰 그을 어긘쟈 믄득 경무쳥으로 보내니 슬푸다 나라에 엇지 가히 로라도 졍부가업고 대신이 엇지 져희 무리 츌쳑 밧쟈며 경무를 엇지 져희 무리가 아 부르듯기 며 경무쳥을  엇지 져희 무리가 사샤로 셜시 거시리오  향일에 신문에 긔 바 갈닌 탁지 대신 신 민영긔 샹쇼 의를 본즉 그 금쥰 거시 죡히 귀신과 독비로 여곰 형벌에 도망 고 란신 적로 간담이 샹거시어 슬푸다 져완것들이 낫에 임의 형셰를 닐우어 긔습이 더욱 승고 위월이 심야 법샤를 란만이 들어가 사 업것치 보와 사법관 공갈 기를 하인 치짓고 판장을 급히 부르 령과 죄인 속히 잡으란 명령 위엄이 샹셜고 르기가 바람과 우고 쳔금으로 갑을 달고 사 잡 어 오라는거를니 이흔 역적은 이젼 에 구여도 일즉이듯지 못 바이니  가히 대한에 신민이라 며폐하의 적라 일으리요 대개 그챵쟈를 포 쟤 셩은 내가 거릴거이오 관쟉은 내가 식이고 갈게 것이오 졍 쟈루 내가 조죵 것이오 상벌은 내가 임의로 랴것이니 그리면 대한 젼국이 임의 져희 무리의게 부치인거시니 어대황뎨 일홈이 계시며  어 모든 대신의 직권이 잇스리오 슬푸다 져희 무리 죠흔 말을 다고 칭쟈 외국 규례에 지내지안코 셩셰를 빙쟈  쟈 다만 이웃 나라 군이오폐하셔 리시 바쟈와 여러 대신의 압졔를 보쟈도  이것이오 젼졔 졍치와 립헌 졍치나라에 엇지님군이 업고 신하가 업고 셩이 그권리를 로  법이 잇스며동 슈호 나라에 엇지 란신을 보호며 역적을 도아 군를 일홈업시 낼 리치가 잇스릿가 이거슨 외국에 근본 업 법이요 니웃 나라에 반시 업슬 리치인 그 잉긔게 여 졈졈 불공여 써 리가 크셔 흔들게 어렵기 된쟈 특별히폐하셔 포용시 덕과 인신 각이 넘우 과셔 일운라 진실노 능히 훈계 여도증계가 아니 되면 벌주고 벌도 곳치지 아니면 버히고 죽여도 나라 법과 왕쟝을 두려워게 면 져명완 불령쟈가 맛당히 두려워야 로날을 지지 못야 순 도라 오리니 이거시녯젹 어진 님군이 번 노야 텬하를 편안히 도가 아니리요 오직셩명셔 슬푸다  부에 대신과 여덜 마을 신하가 뉘가 오년 벼던 사의 손과 십년 물 져진 몸이 아니리오 이나라 형셰 급업고황샹의 근심이 쵸죠신를 당야 다민영긔 바른말 외에 다시 사도 나셔셔 말이가 업고 다몬 졔몸만 피 계교를 니 이거시 엇지 심복이 혹 란도에 붓다러 그러 리오 나인즉 텬부지 셩이 강직지 못 고 날 에 귀골노 스로 연약 이 만한 거시요 둘인즉 고기 먹 쟈가 가 업셔셔 써 베히고 졔 계을 아지 못 연고라 오직셩명셔 용셔 쇼셔 신이 디 쳔한 자최로 비록 하을 괴이고 집을 밧칠 힘은 업오나 텬셩이 쵸아 오히려 강샹을 가히 범치 못며 란신 젹를 다 어더 죽일줄을 아고로 을미팔월에 나라에 큰 변이 잇셔 곳 살 을 버리고 대강 샹소를 야 감히 흉 칼날을 붓잡엇스나 권셰 잇 간신의 져희바 되여 비록 등쳘은못 엿스나텬감이 발그샤 통쵹샤복위고 흉적을 업후에 은혜로 신을 슈령을 식히시니 신이 이에 흘 둘고 도망와셩샹셔 신하알으시 발으심을 루되게 아니코쟈나 엇지 못엿더니 이졔 연곡 아 이런 광경을 보니 이 놀내고 손과 다리가 덜여 곳 그 고기를 먹고 십흐며 그 가죡을 고십흔지라 스로 각 건 쇠버러지가 능히 슈레를 막지 못고 모긔가 능히 태산을 지지못나 그러나 구렁이 압희 잇고 난것과 불이뒤에 잇슴을 도라 보지 아니 고 감히 어리셕은 말을 알외오니 복걸셩명셔 귀적으로 써 적와 치보시지 마시고 급히 번 노심을 베푸샤 써 우리 오년션왕 죵샤를 보젼 소셔신은 압흔 소로 통곡을 익의지 못니다 엿다더라  완

dcterms:title: We are informed that a favorite of the Palace has started a Cattle Insurance
dcterms:abstract: We are informed that a favorite of the Palace has started a Cattle Insurance Company by force of an Edict. A company of this nature pate◈◈ed by the Department of Agriculture was in existence some time last year. But the agents went about in the country compelling owners of cattle to pay 20 cents a head on the condition that when an ox or a cow died of sickness or accident, the company would pay the original price. So much squeezing was practiced under the pretext that the Department of Agriculture abolished the hateful association to the relief of every lover of justice. To revive the institution by an edict, will not only subject the people to the extortions of unser◈pulous agents but expose the orders of His Majesty to popular contempt and odium. We are very sorry that the favorite has suceeded in securing the monopoly

dcterms:title: 美國旋風의 損害
dcterms:abstract: ⊙（美國旋風의 損害）同報에 曰美國데기사스 州베스튼 地에셔 旋風이 起야 其損害를 受 財産이 一千萬弗에 至고 破壞 汽船이 八隻이오 其風災가 同州棉作地에 廷及야 非常 損害가 有고 此風害의 死亡者ㅣ一萬에 達야 一帶地方의 光景이 頗慘酷 黑人이 橫行야 死者의 所有品을 掠奪 由로 同地方에 戒嚴令을 施行더라  北京在圍日記            （續）七月十一日予ㅣ支那義勇兵을 率고 敵前家屋에 防禦를 施 敵兵이 數十間距離되 丘上에셔 山砲로 此家屋을 射擊야 砲座를 破壞니 予와 並立던 支那人二名은 負傷氣絶고 予 僥倖塵烟中을 突出야 餘在 支那人을 更救고 後面陣地로 退歸얏 此日楢原陳政氏가 敵에게 左脚을 重傷지라 夜엔 敵軍이 總攻擊을 行다 說이 有나 豆煎갓 銃聲만 有더라七月十二日午前三時에 敵이 暗密侵入야 我北面大屋에 放火야 我兵으로써 發砲치못게니 我 有名 牧丹臺라 高地에 在야 其退却路를 打며 數名을 倒 敵이 遂放火遁去고 此時에 東方大門에 在 原大尉도 亦陣地를 向야 大砲를 頻放나 敵의 攻擊이 益激으로 東門이 破壞며 瓦石이 亂下야 極히 危險지라 峭兵을 停止고 陣地를 西方으로 移 英國兵五名이 來援고 我兵은 乘夜야 陣地를 原位置로 復設야 晝間에 破壞 大門의 瓦石을 積야 測邊의 防禦로써 交通의 安全을 謀며 敵은 夜間來襲나 大事에 不至고 此日上諭를 見즉 聶士成이 戰死얏더라    （未完）

dcterms:title: 敍任及辭令

dcterms:title: 兩氏談話
dcterms:abstract: ●兩氏談話大韓自强會総代 尹孝定 李宇榮 兩氏가 去十七日 草梁美人의 醫院에셔 錦陵尉 朴泳孝氏를 面會얏 兩氏間에 談話을 漏聞 즉 尹氏가 該會의 歡迎 意를 致야 曰 國家人民은 今日 悲慘에 墮落고 各般社會 信仰 標準이 無人야 國民의 一致 精神이 不立 幾個의 苦心人士 國家進步의 前途를 是懼더니 此時에 閤下가 歸國시고 恩赦와 復爵의 皇恩이 稠疊심은 或者上天이 我國에 禍를 悔 人士의 依信 元龜를 命送신 쥴노 認定고 本大韓自强會 本人 等의게 委任야 國境에 前赴야 歡迎 眞意를 表明케 이라 錦陵尉答曰 貴會에 錯愛심을 猥蒙야 遠地에 歡迎시기에 至은 實노 萬萬感謝거니와 社會의 標準으로 推심은 果難承當이오 且今日二十世紀 雖有英雄之姿와 豪傑之才라도 國家經營은 決코 一二個人의 可히 如何 者가아닌 則 惟我同胞가 今日 國勢民權을 回復 目的으로 勉力從事진 本人이 品雖愚駑나 三十年間에 國家로 身家를 不顧야 海外에 飄泊얏다가 今에 聖恩이 天大사 從玆以後로 完全 大韓臣民의 一分子資格을 恢復얏슨 則 自己의 力量로 國家의 臣民된 義務를 自盡코져 지나 但 何人과 何會를 不問하고 自國의 精神이 充滿하야 實力을 養成하며 鄰邦의 關係를 明察하야 友睦을 保全하며 正大 趣旨와 行動으로 國人의 信愛를 最厚히 享受 者로 더부러 民智開發에 從事하고 今日 我韓의 國是도 亦此로 認定이 可하다 하얏다더라

dcterms:title: 各地通信
dcterms:abstract: ▲八日水原發電을 據즉 京釜線餠店驛東北三拾里先長洞에 義兵七百名이 集合야 烏山驛과 振威驛을 襲擊다 揚言하고▲七日忠州발電을 據則去三日에 義徙三十名이 延豐에셔 聞慶邑에 來야 當地補佐員과 郵便局員과 日本商人들과 接戰야 日人은 尙州方面으로 退却얏 其中에 一名은 重傷며 日人遞傅夫 被害고 義兵은 日人居住던 附近民家十五戶와 幷郵便局을 燒却고 該近電柱六本을 折倒고 廷豐으로 退却엿고▲八日大邱發電을 據즉 當日午後三時에 義兵約一百五十名이 星州邑을 來襲야 廳舍及日人家屋全部를 燒火얏 郵便局長과 日人三名과 巡檢三名은 生死가 不明다허고▲醴泉郡에도 不穩야 郵便局과 分派所 尙州로 引揚얏다고▲八日鳥致院發電을 據則秋風嶺北方約四十里達寧地方에 義徒數百名이 集合허야 星州分派所를 襲擊다 報가 有허고▲餠店驛東北約三十里龍仁郡仙谷洞에 義兵七百餘名이 集合허얏 所內西南山洞尹基善家의에 火繩銃二柄과 東面金永喜家에셔 洋式獵銃一挺을 掠奪고 竹山方面으로 向얏다고▲九日鳥致院發電을 據즉 京釜線列車가 平澤驛을 發야 約四十間을 經過 時에 韓人五六名이 投石허엿스나 損害 無허다허고▲二日午後八時에 義兵七十名이 突然히 平海分派所를 襲擊허 日本巡査三名이 對戰허다가 衆寡不敵허여 각自逃避허엿다허고▲寧越東方五十里地点에셔 義兵五十名과 日兵一部대가 遇着接戰허야 日兵一名이 戰死얏고 義兵은 死傷이 不明허다고▲忠州郡附近戰鬪報道를 據則八月二十三日午前拾一時에 韓兵約二百名이 堤川街道에셔 忠州郡을 進擊다 報告가 有대 日兵에 豐饒대 北門을 占領고 戰鬪斥侯 校洞高地와 南部高地의셔 一時頃을 對戰허얏대 曹長은 衛兵及其下를 指揮허야 兵舍를 守備게다허고▲同日二時에 校洞戰鬪斥候에 報告를 據則義兵約五拾名이 淸風街道一千二百米突高地中心에 散開허고 其後方八百米突에셔 舊式野砲를 据置하고 猛烈히 射擊허엿다허고▲同日午後零時에 忠州堤川間遞步哨에 報告를 據즉 忠州邑約三十五里地点一帶高地에셔 義兵과 日兵이 交戰대 義兵의 氣勢가 猛烈허여 日兵一餘名이 負傷허엿다허고▲同日三時의 二宮대에 報告를 據則義兵約百餘名이 淸風街道에셔 翼으로 北方約千五百米突되 地를 涉허야 占領허고 日兵은 約千二百미突距離에 駐在허엿 二拾餘名義兵은 五百米突附近에 前進허고 又約拾名은 日兵의 左翼으로 迂回허야 交戰허엿다허고▲同日에 忠州東방面의셔 義兵이 日本豊饒대와 强硬히 交戰허엿다고▲八月二十六日의 義兵約三百名이 廷農邑을 來襲허야 郡守와 書記를 捕捉허고 同郡南方約三十里地方으로 退却허얏고▲七日午前발成歡電을 據則安城附近에 義兵이 蜂起 貌樣이 有허야 同日朝에 居住日人四十餘名이 成歡으로 逃走허엿다더라

dcterms:title: 部令
dcterms:abstract: ○部令  學部所管日本國留學生規程을左갓치定홈  隆照  年十二月一日學部令第二十一號      學部所管日本國留學生規程第一條  官費留學生은特히日本國留學을必要로學術技藝履修케기爲야官立高等學校又此와同等以上으로認官公私立學校의卒業證書有者中에셔檢定을行後에學部大臣이此命홈第二條  前條의檢定은學力、品行及身軆에對야此行홈檢定方法及▣科目等은每度此定홈第三條  官費留學生의履修學科及留學期間은學部大臣이指定홈  學部大臣이必要로認時指定留學期間이滿了後에尙且學科履修又實地研究기爲야留學期間을延長事가有홈第四條  官費留學生▣被命者受命日로붓터七日以內에別記第一号書式의誓約書提呈이可홈第五條  官費留學生을被命者受命日로브터二十日以內에居住地出發야到着後迅速히留學生監督에게報告이可홈第六條  留學生監督은官費留學生의入學學校指定이可홈第七條  官費留學生에게別表에依야往復旅費、束裝費、學資金及滯在費支給홈  但學資金과滯在費重疊支給치아니홈  前項의學資金은學校納付金、寄宿料、被服費及圖書器機費에分야學校納付金은實費로支給고其他留學生監督이學校의種類及學校所在地의狀况에依야學部大臣의認可受야定額을定야此支給홈  在學學校의指定을變㪅境遇에其學資支給額이不同時其八學日치從來의學資金을支給홈  第一項外에必要로認時實費로治療費、修學旅行費及入學轉學에要旅費支給홈  （未完）

dcterms:title: AGAINST OPIUM
dcterms:abstract: AGAINST OPIUM.The increasing use of opium among Koreans is a cause of great alarm. The Police Department has issued a proclamation by order of the Home Department, to warn the people against the disastrous habit of smoking opium. We are glad to see that the authorities have taken the matter in hand. But mere proclamations will never be able to cope with the growing evil. These who indulge in the habit are public enemies and ought to be punished severely enough to keep others from imitating them. Sufficient unto Korea are the evils thereof without importing any new ones, like opium smoking, from abroad

dcterms:title: 遠東報의 時評
dcterms:abstract: 朝鮮景況이 日漸衰頹하야 自俄曆千九百〇五年十一月十七日에 日本과 朝鮮이 立約以後로 朝鮮이 盡失國權하야 未能自由故로 民間이 怨恨하야 至今各處에 屢有變亂之象니 駐찰日軍이 甚形忙碌야 每日調遣하야 防範亂事하되 韓民이 因其受日人虐待야 含之次骨故로 拒敵이 更爲同心이라 曾閱日本報등載니 多係僞造飾辭라 其曰日軍이 彈壓韓民야 願代爲敎化愚民等語가 雖以巧言遮掩이나 人誰信之리오朝鮮人民이 豈有欲求兵燹刀鋸之敎化哉아 必仍不遵守約束이면 日軍이 必增加兵隊야 以力服之야 擠之於死地리니 吾輩 深信此死地가 實誠爲安謐之地로다 日人이 顯告韓民되 係欲爲地方야 求其安謐이라고 乃以强力으로 擠韓民於黑闇也界니吾輩 深信此黑闇世界가 固宜永遠安謐也로다 近에 日本報가 佈散謠言되 俄國이 預備軍火야 欲與日本開戰이라니 盖日本軍務中矦補人員이 以爲借此謠言야 可獲差遣이라이니豈知於商工界上에 大有關碍리오 現商工이 聞此開戰之謠고 心神不安者가 不少지라 伊藤侯並西園寺矦가 准彼國議院이 議軍務武員의 裁去文官職任故로奉省에 日本軍務武員이 恐要津失據야 날造警信야 以爲未可更動이오 當敵抗俄國遠踞之意라니 此說이 可笑可惡이라 俄與日之軍務 日本이 始終에 俄有遠踞之實據를 並未察出이라 現時俄兵이 在滿州一帶에 所餘無多고 准在俄日退兵限內야 遵守約章지라俄國은 深願南北商民이 乘坐火車야 隨便往來고 且兩國이 已經約定商民徃來等情이거를 奉天南省一帶에 日本이 依然禁阻俄人니 其違背約章야 不守國際公法을 大可想見이라前에 日本이 曉諭人民되 奉省南部에 日軍이 佔據房産貨物은 除俄國官府以外者 均宜發還商民等이라니 是以로 俄國商民이 由外務部並欽差야 稟請東京發給路票執照야 以便赴旅順一帶야 査看房産貨物고 並有搬移屍骨者호日官이 多方駁退야 不給執照니 其無信이 如此라 俄國은 任滿洲一帶에 設立衙門辦理軍務事宜를 刻亦將次收盡而待至完結야 卽將各衙門야 均行裁去려니와試觀日本은 鯨呑朝鮮고 虎踞奉省南部호 猶不自知足야 奪取中國各種權利고 攪亂中國兵民야 不能安謐케니 結怨中韓之民이 日深一日야 今朝鮮變象이 見矣라 將來奉省之民은 獨無困獸猶鬪之虞乎아 願日本主持外交者 三復余言이라얏더라

dcterms:title: ARE CHINESE BUSINESS MEN HONEST?
dcterms:abstract: The Peking and Tientsin Times of Feb. 27 published the following letter from a foreign correspondent signing himself “Pekingese.”一The reports of imminent business failures in Shanghai and elsewhere have moved me to pen the following, for which I beg you to give space. An old China hand once stated that more money had been lost by foreigners in China than had been made and instanced the facts that every Hong [building] in Shanghai had recorded a failure, that all the other outports had witnessed the same, that the only firms which were flourishing in China were those whose dealings were principally with foreigners, or which, besides their legitimate business, had invested in land, houses, Insurance Companies, Banks, and-or such investments as Docks. Today, had he lived, he would have seen his assertion literally fulfilled. The cardinal creed of the old China Hongs was the honesty of the Chinaman. The late Sir Ewen Cameron, who was one of those rare men that obtain the devotion [one might almost write, worship] of every man who came in contact with him, and Sir Thomas Jackson, who, I have reason to hope, is still hale and hearty, both on leaving the Far East said, “a Chinaman’s word is as good as another man’s bond.” Following such an announcement the Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation found they were one or two Compradores and other satelites missing. Now look at the miserable stories reaching us from every Treaty port. One series of disasters to some of the most honoured names in the mercantile history of this unhappy country! Sentiment has a great deal of the wrongs of this life to answer for, but no other country on earth can show such a list of business failures as China does to-day, and all caused through the delusion that people are dealing invariably with honest men. If it were possible to get correct figures— the total capital lost in the country by foreigners would startle the world!

dcterms:abstract: ○法律  法律第一號      船舶法              （續）第七條  前五條의 規定은 総噸數二拾噸未滿又 積石數二百石未滿의 船舶及端舟其他櫓櫔으로 運轉거나 又 主로야 櫓權로 運轉 舟或은 推進器 有치아니 浚渫船及航行의 用에 供치니 船舶에 此 適用치아니홈第八條  第二條에 依야 登錄 事項에 燮㪅을 生 時 船舶所有者 其事實을 知 日로붓터 三週間內에 所轄稅關에 申請야 其燮㪅의 登錄을 受이 可홈第九條  船舶國籍證書에 記載 事項에 燮㪅을 生 時 船舶所有者 其事實을 知 日로붓터 三週間內에 所轄稅關에 申請고 其換書 受이 可홈 船舶國籍證書 毁損 時도 亦同홈第十條  船舶國籍證書 滅失 時 船舶所有者 其事實을 知 日로붓터 三週間內에 所轄稅關에 申請야 其再交付 受이 可홈第十一條  第二條에 依야 登錄을 受 船舶이 滅失或은 沈沒 時、觧撤된 時又 韓國의 國籍을 喪失거나 或은 第七條에 該當 船舶이된 時 船舶所有者 其事實을 知 日로붓터 三週間內에 其事由 記明야 所轄稅關에 抹消의 登錄을 申請고 且遲滯옵시 船國籍證書 返還이 可홈 船舶의 存否가 六個月間分明치아니 時도 亦同홈  前項의 境遇에 在야 船舶所有者가 抹消의 登錄을 行치아니 時 所轄稅關은 一個月內에 此 行이 可 事 催告고 尙히 其節次 行치아니 時 職權으로 抹消의 登錄을 行을 得홈第十二條  第七條에 揭 船舶의 所有者 左의 揭 者 除 外所轄財務署에 申請야 船準牌의 交付 受이 可홈  一、総噸數五噸未滿又 積石數五十石未滿의 帆船  二、端舟其他櫓權으로 運轉거나 又 主로야 櫓權로 運轉 舟  三、推進器 有치아니 浚渫船及航行의 用에 供치아니 船舶第十三條  韓國船舶의 所有者 左의 區別에 從야 每年十月에 船舶 納付이 可홈  一、総噸數十噸又 積石數百石以上의 船舶은 每一噸又 十石지마다            金四  錢  二、総噸數十噸又 積石數百石未滿의 船舶은        金四十錢                        （未完）

dcterms:title: THE SITUATION IN KOREA
dcterms:abstract: THE SITUATION IN KOREA.The events which have recently taken place in the capital of this Empire have been varied and unique enough to satisfy those who have been complaining of a monotonous life in this land. It is true that these affairs were not interwoven with romance, poetry or music but the lack of these features ought to compensate for the fact that they were actual dramas acted before the unlimited audience of the world. There must be various critics who either applause or hiss in silence at the end of each act but we are of those persons who cannot resist from making loud mental comments.The recent communication forwarded by the Russian representative to the Korean Foreign Office, relative to the Russian adviser and military instructors, was a very fair and honorable document. It seemed thoroughly in harmony and altogether consistent with the declarations of policy which Russia has made relative to her position and aims in Korea.In a time of great need and when her condition was precarious and her independence not fully assured, Korea turned to her neighbor on the North and asked for aid. This was granted on terms apparently satisfactory to both parties. Time passed. After profiting for two years the ◈, so willingly furnished, Korea wished the relation to be dissolved and the aid withdrawn, or rather will be withdrawn. This seems to have arisen from two causes : Korea believes that she can manage her own affairs without foreign assistance, and dissatisfaction among the Korean people over the state of affairs has appeared.Without discussing these reasons, for a moment, it is only fair to look at the Russo-Korean argeement as a business matter. Such occasions as these arise in business as well as in political life. In the hope, then, of furthering the prosperity of Korea and to that extent of insuring her independendence ― for until a nation is prosperous it cannot be altogether independent ― aid wa◈ of Russia to insure the proper handling of finances and the proper drilling of troops. The time has come when this aid has been politely permitted to be withdrawn. With a dignity co◈nant with the two nations the permission to withdraw was received and undoubtedly will be complied with in the same friendly spirit in which it was given.By this action Russia has showed that she does not intend to ◈erce herself upon her little, though sovereign, neighbor and the correspondents of foreign papers will find with difficulty an ulterior motive in the honorable way in which Russia has acted in the present event to satisfy their exaggerated reports. Russia has been quick to notice signs of unrest in Korea and has taken this opportunity to withdraw her aid in the same disinterested way in which it was granted when asked for, and gains an enviable reputation in the eyes of the world. Moreover by so doing Russia avoids the possibility of becoming involved in undesirable complications with other powers.The reasons which are offered by Korea for permitting Russia to withdraw her aid are entitled to notice. They have been already been mentioned―the belief that Korea can manage her own affairs and dissatisfaction among the common people because of foreign interferences.No one can be so poor a student of political science as not to know and instantly admit that the managing successfully of the finances of a nation is a task worthy of a clear mind, well trained in the difficult problems of exigency, of resources and of the limits of that nation´s monetary condition. That one could pose as a financier who is not well acquainted with problems which daily arise and who has not received an education for such a work is bound, by all laws, to fail. While we believe the controlling power should not pass out of the hands of the government, we do believe that, at present, Korea can ill afford to deprive her Finance Department of the advice of well trained men who must come from foreign lands. If this is not to be we fear that things will go back to the state prevalent in antibellum days and that \"grab politics\" will reign supreme. There will be, we fear, little stable organization and little system as far as a permanent financial policy goes.For two years Russian officers have trained the Korean soldiery. So far as we know this has been done faithfully and thoroughly. We do not know, however, that any Korean officers have been developed who are capable of taking the soldiers now and giving them thorough modern training. As in other governmental departments we believe that the controlling authority should be entirely in the hands of the government but that those acquainted with all modern methods of technique and the science of arms should drill and instruct the Korean troops. By pursuing this course the neighboring Empire of Japan has emerged from a dispised to a courted military power in the short space of thirty years. The Korean government has permitted Russia to withdraw the aid she has been tendering to Korea because ◈ believes she can do without foreign assistance. As a sovereign power she has the right to make the trial but we have grave dloubts as to its success, however much we hope for it.It seems almost too good to believe that Korea can find men among her own people who are efficient enough to undertake to rule the country wisely and well. Could this be proven in the months that are to come it will herald the brightest era in the history of the peninsula Empire

dcterms:title: 法律
dcterms:abstract: 官報○法律 [前號續]第八節 未遂犯第八十六條 罪를 犯랴 야 陰謀고 准備지 거나 其事 已行얏스되 其意外의 障碍나 舛錯됨을 因야 犯罪에 未及 者를 未遂犯이라 이라第九節 不論罪類第八十七條 守土人을 除 外에 人의 威脅을 抵當치 못야 犯罪된 者 勿論이라 △第八十八條 水火盜賊과 其他 意外의 變을 因야 回避기 不能거나 危難을 遭야 權限內에 可히 保護만 者를 爲야 犯罪된 者 勿論이라 △第八十九條 本法律諸條의 犯人의 情을 不知 者 勿論이라 △第九十條 癈疾者의 癈疾을 因야 邂逅犯罪 時 罪로 論치 아니이라 △第九十一條 九十歲以上 七十歲以下者가 犯罪 時 罪로 論치 아니이라第三編 刑例 第一章 刑罰通則第一節 刑名 刑具及獄具第九十二條 罪를 治 刑은 左開二種으로 區別이라 一 主刑 二 附加刑 △第九十三條 主刑은 左開五種으로 區別이라 一 死刑 二 流刑 三 役刑 四 禁獄刑 五 笞刑 △第九十四條 死刑은 左와 如이라 一 絞 △第九十五條 流刑은 島地에 押付야 保授이니 左開十等으로 區別이라 但 逃脫 慮가 有 境遇에 該地方監獄에 囚禁이라 一 終身 二 十五年 三 十年 四 七年 五 五年 六 三年 七 二年半 八 二年 九 一年半 十 一年 △第九十六條 役刑은 監獄에 囚禁야 役에 服케 이니 等數 第九十五條 流刑과 同이라 △第九十七條 禁獄은 監獄에 囚禁이니 左開十等으로 區別이라 一 十個月 二 九個月 三 八個月 四 七個月 五 六個月 六 五個月 七 四個月 八 三個月 九 二個月 十 一個月 △第九十八條 笞刑은 小荊條로 臀을 打이니 左開十等으로 區別이라[笞長 周尺三尺五寸 大頭徑二分七里 小頭徑一分七里]一 一百二 九十 三 八十 四 七十 五 六十 六 五十 七 四十 八 三十 九 二十 十 一十 △第九十九條 附加刑은 左開二種으로 區別이라 一 免官 免役二 沒入 [未完]

dcterms:title: 慶南愛國
dcterms:abstract: ●慶南愛國敬啓者 昔有一婦人이 胖厚而多産育니 首男은 已長成고 其次 仰母竢育者 又六七個瓦璋이라 一日에 婦人이 浣於溝上 値眩虛昏倒於地니 忽天이 驟雨야 山谷暴浪이 掩至에 魚腹滄溟이 判在頃刻이라 六七子女 環母傍號哭고 長男은 岸上徘徊다가 叫羣弟而避之曰 母軆가 胖重且病시니 非吾力의 動彈得이라 汝輩 免致淪胥라 我也 早辦衾槨고 傭設大譙호리라 個中七歲末男이 唱出一謀야 觧其鞶帶而結母裾고 蟻附而一齊拽起니 呼耶一聲에 病母 登岸고 浪劫은 過去니 殆哉奇哉라 須臾의 母亦惺甦而安過니라 向使母로 不産寧馨的此兒男이런들 蕭湘江上帝女班竹과 女須寒砧이 終古凄凉이리라 嗚呼라 現今 吾邦之外債 一千三百萬圜이 不啻若山谷暴浪之禍이어 在岸徘徊야 準備衾槨者 當路諸公이 是也오 自然天倫이 不避淪胥고 環母號哭者은 我二千萬兄弟是也오 唱出機權야 拯救母溺者 今日 國債報償斷烟會發起之諸兄이 是也라 吾輩도 曾一環母號哭之一個同胞로 當此本會擴張이 自京而嶺야 次第 激發니 吾省三十二郡原隰之鶺鴿도 不可泯默일 玆敢仰佈오니 至若斷烟之名目야 以斷烟之義로 爲同盟之嚆矢오 非以斷烟之利로 爲淸債之準的이라 聞京城幾婦人이 減粮捐助라 니 推此爲心에 斷烟之義務를 庶可諒會이라 晨起草函니 雙眸에 淚遮고 五內에 血沸라 仁兄仁弟와 善姊善妹아 勿願爲富貴壯元고 唯願爲忠孝壯元야 以左趣旨로 淸償國債고 同享安樂於父母之邦를 敬要홈左開一 本所名은 愛國償債所리 稱 晉州樂育學校事務室로 權定홈, 一 道內開會日字 本年三月十九日[陰二月初五日]로 郡內[晉州郡]開會 本月十三日[陰正月二十九日]로 定니 道內每郡에 有志紳士 一員式 郡內各面에 面長 一員式 起送 特願參會之員은 本他道을 勿拘고 數額도 勿限, 一 公函을 覽卽回答며 一一翻論于村村家家야 無一人不聞不知케 홈, 一 助金은 勿拘多小고 孤兒嫠婦라도 出義시거든 受고 雖金谷陶朱라도 慳吝 境遇에 勿爲强求홈, 一 各郡에도 支所를 組成고 助金을 收取야 郵便으로 輸送本所면 本會財務員이 領証을 捺章兌送며 助金人의 姓名住址를 詳錄伴送와 新聞上에 揭佈케 홈, 一 各人의 助金을 勿論多小고 受員이 領証을 繕給며 通衢에 投書桶을 揭야 助員이 所助金額를 各錄投桶거든 所長이 開取야 收員의 記簿와 相準야 慮外防奸케 홈, 一 各郡會에셔 任員氏啣을 錄通本所홈, 一 本所所費 會員이 出義支用고 助金額中에 勿爲犯用홈, 一 收金期限은 自開會日로 始야 三個月以後에 勿爲聽受홈, 一 收入金은 農工銀行의 貯積얏다가 成就홈을 竢야 國債報償에 萬分之一이라도 充補케 홈慶南愛國會 發起人 安宅重 安孝政 金基大 等 二十人

dcterms:title: Not that we have been in any sense dead but merely like \"Bre◈r Rabbit\"
dcterms:abstract: RESURRECTION.Not that we have been in any sense dead but merely like Bre◈r Rabbit laying low. Now that we are restarting it is simply the continuation of the effort made in the past and carried on by THE KOREAN REPOSITOAY—since we suspended publication at the close of last year—to supply news for the Foreign residents in this land, and we are sure we are only giving expression to the sentiments of the whole of our readers when we return our hearty thanks to the Editors and Manager for their successful endeavour to fill the gap caused by our exit and for listening to the demand from city and country for news which came to them in the early weeks of the year, It is superflous for us to say how deeply we regret the cause which compels the manager to leave Seoul after his short sojourn amongst us. We sincerely trust that his wife may speedily recover and that we may soon see them with us again.While we admire the determination with which the Editors of the KOREAN REPOSITORY set out. Not to take any part in politics, we are afraid we cannot claim to be so reserved, because we believe that a good deal of the spice of life is in things political. Even if one does not happen to be acquainted with the whole of the happenings of The wheels within wheels there is something to be gotten from the segments though they should be shaky and fail to meet at all points. Again one has to have an outlet for the superflous energy somewhere and the outlet proves the safety valve. In addition to which it is an educating force as may have been observed here in the Capital last Autumn. While there is not the same amount of bigotry displayed in politics as there is over some other questions, theology for instance; and as we hope to be an educating power more especially in the Native Edition it will be our aim to turn the search light on to the things that occour about us daily. We shall show no quarter to wickedness or oppression in high or low places but trust we shall be enabled to reveal without Judgment, as we do not occupy the position of Judge to any. All may depend that we shall endeavour to carry out our motto, and while whittling down nothing yet to set down nothing in a spirit of hatred. We are sure that those who do well have nothing to fear while those you do evil will want to cover it up. Now that we have revived again and have not three men and a boy to keep things going we shall be glad of the help of our former contributors and correspondents and any new ones who would like to contribute to the success of this paper, let us hear from you often, our old friends Columbus´ Molayo, The man with a White Hat, Pepper Salt Old Residents Casuals, etc., etc.We shall be pleased to make THE INDEPENDENT the channel of communication between our Missionary friends of City and Country so that words of encouragement may come at first hand to those on the field rather than after having travelled the rounds of the five continents, and then being received here in a somewhat altered condition.We want to appoint agents in every country district for the sale of the Native Edition and shall be glad to receive application from any one which may be accompanied by a letter of recommendation from the foreign pastor, not as making him in any way responsible for the collection of funds or anything of that sort but merely that we may know to whom we are sending. Among the places where we are not at present represented are Chinnampo, Wonsan, Woonsan, Taiku, Mokpo, Chunju, Kongju, Songdo, Pyengyang, etc., etc.The Manager of the KOREAN REPOSITORY has very kindly placed at our disposal the list of subscribers to that paper, to whom we have great pleasure in sending our first number of Vol. 4 to which we hope they will continue to subscribe We are also sending to all the Foreign Residents in Korea who have not subscribed to that paper, in the hope that they will take enough interest in things Korean to become subscribers to THE INDEPENDENT and send in their names quickly to this office so that we may receive the assurance of renewed welcome into the homes of the dwellers in this peninsula.We are not at all particular as to the kind of way in which subscriptions come in so long as they do come, whether in cheques, paper or silver yen or postage stamps either Korean or Japanese of large or small denominations.As we are the only advertising mediam in Korea in the English language our columns will be found very advantageous to advertisers who want to reach the foreign population and our rates will be found very reasonable to those who are seeking to extend their business relations here

dcterms:title: 學部令第二十號
dcterms:abstract: ○學部令第二十號    師範學校令施行規則    （續）  八  學習 方法은 敎授에만 偏倚      이 不可지라 故로 學員으로      야금 自修야 學識을 進就      며 技藝를 研究 習慣을 養成      기로 勉力이라  九  學科 所定 敎科書에 依야      敎授이라    第二章  學科日及要旨第五條  師範學校本科의 學科目은 修  身、敎育國語、漢文、日語、歷史、地  理、數學、物聖、化學、博物、圖畵、音  樂、軆操、로이라 但音樂은 現今間  만 關을 得이라  學校長이 學部大臣의 認可를 得야  前項各科目外에 農業商業手工中의  一科目이나 或數個科目을 添入 事  를 得이라  此等敎科目을 添入 境遇에 其學  員의 所長을 從야 其中一科目을 敎  習케이라  豫科及速成科의 學科目은 本科를 依  準고 講習科의 學科目을 必要을  隨야 學校長이 定야 學部大臣의  認可 受이라第六條  師範學校의 各學科目을 敎授   要旨 左와 如이라  一  修身  躬行實踐으로 宗旨를      삼고 言論만 虛尙 偏習이 無      케이라  二  敎育  普通學校敎育 趣旨      와 方法을 觧得케야 敎育者될      만 精神을 養成으로 宗旨      를삼고 言論만 虛尙야 高遠      데 馳騖 弊端이 無케이라      實地授業에 就야 附屬普通      學校에셔 次第로 師範學員으로      야금 學徒를 敎授케고 敎員      은 其授業을 監督야 臧否를      批評고 時時로 躬自敎授      야 模範을 示이라      實地授業時間은 第三學年의 前      半年이나 後半年으로 分定야      敎授나니 此境遇에 他學科      目의 每週敎授時間을 他半年에      移定이라三  國語  講讀은 發音及句讀    것을 注意야 講讀 時에 讀者    及聽者로야금 文勢와 文義를    觧得케을 務고 作文은 簡明    誠實으로 爲主고 問題 普    博히 各學科에셔 敎授 事項과    日常必要 事項에 就야 實用    기에 適當 者를 選이라    習字 字様이 端正고 運筆에    澁滯가 無으로 爲主되 爲先    小字를 速寫과 漆板에 寫字    을 熟習케이라四  漢文  音與義를 明白히고 句    讀을 注意야 句義와 章義를    分明케고 兼야 文理脈絡을    觧釋케이라五  日語  發音을 注意야 會話    에 精熟고 正當 國語로 解    釋케며 時時로 飜譯과 作文    을 習케이라六  歷史  事實의 關係된것을 注意    고 文化의 由來바를 知케    을 務이라七  地理  人生에 適當 事項을 知    케을 爲主고 外國地理를 敎    授랴면 本邦과 重要關係가 有     諸外國의 地理를 尤極詳明케    고 其他地理 簡略히고 地    文은 本邦事實을 由야 敎授    이라八  數學  筭術은 精密히 敎授야    運筭의 理由를 詳觧케며 兼    야 心筭及速筭法을 熟習케고    代數及幾何 其初堦를 敎授    이라九  物理化學  實驗에 基因야 正    確 知識을 學得케고 淺近    現象을 觧得 智力을 養야    日常生活과 生業上에 資用기    適當케을 注意이라十  博物  實物及標本等에 就야    確實 知識을 學得케고 又動    物과 植物의 互相關係와 及人生    에 對 關係를 詳察야 日常    生活과 生業上에 資用기 適當      케을 注意이라      標木은 本邦產物로 爲主을 要      이라          〔未完〕

dcterms:title: DECEMBER \"REPOSITORY.\"
dcterms:abstract: DECEMBER \"REPOSITORY.\"The December number of the Korean Repository made its appearance rather later than usual. The original articles in this number are as interesthing as ever and maintain its standard of excellency. The first article on \"john W. Heron, M. D.\" by Ruv. Daniel L.Gifford states many worthy qualities of the late Dr. Heron who had sacrificed his life and all for the sacred cause for which he lab red in this land. Mr. J. N. jordan´s, H. B. M. Consul General, report to the Foreign Office on \"Trade and Commerce of Korea\" was carefully reviewed with some interesting comments. Dr. E. Douglass Follwell gave some extremely enjoyable \"Pyengyang Legends\" which will surely please the readers of the Repository. Prof. H. B. Hulbert tapped another installment of \"Korean Proverbs\" from his inexhaustible supply store which he carries in his cranium. These proverbs show that the Koreans appreciate pithy sayings just as much as their Western friends. \"A Reversed Santa Claus\" by X shows that the unknown quantity understands many of the Korean customs and superstitions. \"Things in General\" reveals to us much useful information on things Korean.Editorally our contemporary quotes at length from other papers concerning the political situation in the Far East especially in Korea. They make very interesting reading but we are at a loss to know the wisdom of our worthy contemporary to quote such articles so extensively. It also speaks of the \"Blow at The INDEPENDENT.\" We are glad to inform our contemporary that we are still alive and our paper a gain goes through the Korean mail as usual. Having the success of the Repository at heart, we trust its friends will remember their duties, financial and literary, to that magazine, and assist, in aiding it, to fulfill its useful mission in this land

dcterms:title: RAILMAY JURISDICTION IN MANCHURIA
dcterms:abstract: European telegrams state that Russia has decided to make Harbin an international settlement, in order to dispose of the difficulty arising out of the enforcement of territorial jurisdiction in the railway zone. It is further stated that M. Isvolsky, Vice-President of the North Manchuria Railway, left St. Petersburg on April 19th to settle the Harbin difficulty. It may, however, be remarked that the organ of the Chinese Eastern Railway has recently contradicted the reported conversion of Harbin into an international settlement. Apropos, some sections in Tokyo clain that Japan’s right in South Manchuria on this score is more strongly established than Russia’s in North Manchuria, inasmuch as Japan’s right is defined by treaties between two Governments and not between a Government and a company

dcterms:title: 尹孝定宣告書
dcterms:abstract: 雜報尹孝定宣告書⊙被告尹孝定案件由檢事公訴審理則被告供稱矣身與金在豊安駉壽諸人親近相從戊戌年間金在豐安駉壽請矣身相議曰現今金鴻陸濁亂政界國事日非吾同志諸人相議欲行改善方略矣身曰其方略何如駉壽曰我皇太子殿下代理聽政一事我皇室固有之議論則相議于我皇上信任宰輔諸臣上奏此事必無不爲允許之理一新政界開進文明何如云故矣身聞是議自思安金兩人多年間出入禁闥皇室眞意大槪推知故必有此議許諾其同意贊成其後往來於安金兩人之間議論其贊成者糾合同年七月分駉壽在泥峴函招故往見則駉壽曰吾儕相議之事豫爲現露今有捕縛之令云一邊函招金在豊則金乃不來而答書曰我是韓人也有罪而死亦於韓國無罪而生亦於韓國往于外國租界避其王章吾所不取台亦與尹友自現爲望云矣果於當日午後某某諸人一一被捉獄事出末後金在豊發配時寄書矣身曰士大夫有所思想於國事聞有罪名避身外國租界非吾平日所望於兄者也慨歎何及從玆以後兄之前路若非日本更無去處乙未復讎一案自乙未十月擧義之時兄我間相議之事也讎賊首犯現在日本兄若東渡殪此賊復讎非但逃避之罪可贖亦可以永有辭於天下後世也矣身慚愧感服其責善之辭當年十一月分亡命日本復讎一事念念在玆難得時機辛丑年春與禹範善同爲敎授之任於泳孝所設朝日新塾外樣親密欲探乙未事變昨年八月與友人兪相範設酌於寓所招待禹賊談論甲午乙未年間政◈翻覆至八月二十日坤靈閤一事其設謀及結果莫非範善自主也誇揚其言爲人臣子之耳不忍聞筆不忍記故矣身心寒膽戰謀殺禹賊之事內定於當席與最親人高永根相約以同謀殺賊之事至九月二十五日自神戶向淸國烟台十月初以暗信十二月一日以後行事之意致書高永根至十月三十一日到着仁港卽入京城留接趙翩家十一月二十四日高永根有刺殺禹賊之事實非矣身及高永根之微力禹賊罪惡彌滿天地間不得逃避天理之致也云戊戌年間安駉壽等所謀認以非◈不軌矣身亦爲贊成事發之後避身渡海敢逭王章自知其罪無辭◈明云其事實被告陳供自服明白被告尹孝定◈◈典◈通推斷條凡亂言若干犯於上情◈切害者律大明律名例共犯罪分首從條隨從者減一等文同律賊盜編謀叛條謀背本國潛從他國但供謀者不分首從律同律名例二罪俱發以重論條凡二罪以上俱發以重者論文當處斬而被告東渡以後決意復讎與高同謀除殺禹賊參究◈跡則潛從他國之律無庸擬論但論以亂言若干犯於上情◈切害者從律被告尹孝定處笞一百流終身之意로 法部大臣署理가 上奏하와 奉旨法不可低昻而功可以贖之者亦所以勸也特爲放送

dcterms:title: 梁山元明
dcterms:abstract: ●梁山元明  梁山郡에 元明學校를 設立고 其趣旨書를 頒布얏 夫國之治亂과 道之晦明이 實關乎國民敎育之如何耳라 在昔盛時에 以國學州校로 至於黨庠家塾히 升俊育英은 莫不以德崇智廣으로 爲高은마 士習이 漸次解弛야 徒能其讀而不究實踐고 汨沒於功令之文이라가 一自科制之廢로 頓無進身之路니 勸奬之風이 尤極掃如라 以若功令之文도 亦旣如是온 而况德育智育之學이야 奚暇有萬一之所徹底乎아 由是而士氣國權이 一時幷墜야 外侮日甚니 寧不歉歎가 此所謂人必自侮而後에 人이 侮之也리 現今世界에 是何時代오 亘前古未聞之各國人物이 以輪舶滊車電車電信電話等奪造化機俱로 視數萬里를 如隔隣相通야 優勝劣敗며 棄短取長之日也라 梁亦大韓三千里疆土內郡邑이오 我亦大韓二千萬同胞中人族으로 其所敎育之方을 若一向安於古俗하고 溺於所聞하야 無斟古酌今하며 取長棄短之理則將於那日에 鞏固我國權하야 比肩於列强乎아 數年以來로 京內京外에 公私學校를 無處不建하고 有志人士〔熱心殫誠하야 視全國內學校를 若自己家產하고 愛全國內靑年을 若自己子姪하야 呶呶喜悅하며 孜孜勸奬은 此非個人之自富自强이라 實爲祖國之無耻無忝이니 令我人人으로 神動意勇하야 下頂門之一針하며 撞警世之大鍾하니 于斯時也에 不覺春夢者ㅣ豈曰有祖國思想底精神乎아 東方이 旣白고 處處에 鳥聲이어날 胡爲乎昏昏然沉沉然야 自做扞格不勝之患歟아 苟不以敎而敎人이면 反不若禽獸之自生自長야 得以蕃息이라 何者오 禽獸 但慾止於食色故로 害物者ㅣ小이되 惟人은 能於欺騙고 能於壓制고 恣其私慾야 經綸流爲와 担詐動作이 無所不至니 雖一日之間이라도 固不可無敎矣라 不然이면 人無爲人이오 國不爲國이라 且鄕校 明人倫興學術隆師道立紀綱重大之所而世遠人亡야 經殘敎弛니 所以學者 安此暴棄고 勸者 未培其根야 世乏良材고 但鄕校 儼然獨立니 孰無慕先聖牖後學之熱誠乎아 迺玆에 齊牧僉議야 始設學校야 命名元明고 使遠近靑年으로 古文今文에 深淺旨趣와 東洋西洋에 强弱形止를 博學而篤志며 切問而近思면 我韓治隆之道도 亦在其中矣니 彼ㅣ金幷山이 若礪고 洛東江이 如帶토록 勸而益勤며 勉而勤勉야 敎育敎育을 進進不已면 非徒吾人之有光이라 實爲靑年之大福이오 抑爲邦國之大慶이니 一心一心으로 務圖務圖야 國之元氣를 克明克明也哉힌져

dcterms:title: 大韓自强會演說
dcterms:abstract: 雜          報●大韓自强會演說  趣旨及特性        尹孝定氏今日은 即大韓自强會苐一回通常開會也라 幸又天晴氣和하야 本會會員外에 贊成員及傍聽諸君이 如雲來臨하야 賁飾光榮하니 本會之感謝 一言難盡이로다抑諸君之如此光臨은 非但求觀於會况之如何라 必欲求聞於趣旨之所在而本人이 忝在發起者之一人故로 會長이 旣命其趣旨及特性之說明則義固不敢辭나 顧以蔑學으로 詞不達意하야 恐無以仰副求聞之盛意로 敢祈俯賜淸聽하노라夫慮危於未危하며 慮亂於未亂하야 使民社長治久安은 賢人哲士之所以綸理邦國也오 惟常人則不然하야 危而後求安며 亂而後思治하며 弱而後求强하나니 今以本會之名之以自强으로 推究發起者之意컨 可見其痛心嘔血於大韓之自弱이니 此所謂旣弱而後求强者乎아然而不察乎時局與國勢之如何하고 濫行武力之强을 如我國之所謂義兵과 淸國之所謂團匪則適足以自兦面决不能自强者也라 所以本會自强之實則本規則苐二條目的에 有曰以敎育產業之研究實施로 期圖自國之富强하야 爲他日獨立之基礎ㅣ是也나 請試思之하시오 謂之他日獨立則今日之獨立은 果安在哉며 果安在哉오 此非但我發起者之痛心區血이라 抑豈非全國同胞之日夜痛心嘔血者乎아若夫敎育殖產之必要則自有諸君之續論이니 某不必贅陳而大抵敎育以强其智力하며 殖產以强其金力하야 竟至於二者之自强則自强之特効 果何如오 曰回復我大韓之獨立主權이며 曰回復我大韓之獨立主權而已로다發起者及本會員之至誠赤心은 固如是而萬我全國同胞가 一向夢夢하야 對我本會而或誹謗之며 或嘲笑之하야 謂之必無所成이라하야 舉皆抛棄而不憐則顧此畧干會員이 其何能自擔於大韓之自强獨立哉아 可憐檀箕舊江山에 復見二千萬紅人種之狀况而已也로다他日云者 自明再明日로 以至未來之千百萬年을 幷皆可稱他日이니 然則曩所謂回復他日之獨立云者ㅣ在於五年十年之內도 亦惟我同胞兄弟며 在於百年二百年之後도 亦惟我同胞兄弟며 以至千年萬年而永不能回復도 亦惟我同胞兄弟也니 祈我大韓之同胞兄弟 勗哉勉哉하며 勉哉勗哉어다今日我韓이 處於世界上最下惟一之地位하야 欲圖富强而幷肩於列强之中則若不養成我一國之特性이면 終難貫徹其獨立之目的이니 此實本會之所謂先得之特性也라 請諸君은 更垂明聽하시오凡天地間之一切動物이 皆於飢食渴飮과 好生惡死之常性外에 別具一種之特性니 略擧其一二則鳥虎之孝와 蜂蟻之忠과 仁性之於麒麟과 放性之於猿猴에 皆其特性이오 國國之人이 各有特性故로 國國이 亦各異其特性니 如日人은 以忠愛爲特性고 露人은 以貪鷙爲特性하고 獨立은 美國之特性이며 自由 英國之特性而因其特性之善否야 係其國家之盛衰니 若論我韓之由來則斷斷是依賴之特性而已라 此實馴致今日之國勢乎힌져然則今日之本會 與大韓同胞로 將以何爲特性乎아 將以何爲特性乎아 曰自强之自一字ㅣ是也오 自者 即我四千二百▣十九年歷代相傳之大韓自國이 是也니 乃所謂大韓精神也로다知其有自以後에 乃知有他오 知有自他之別則必有比較競爭心야 天下之許多絕大事業이 皆從競爭心做出來니 顧今全球가 豈非大比較大競爭的世界乎아 如自貧而他富則思所以自亦富之며 如自弱而他强則思所以自亦强之하며 比較於巧拙而亦如之며 比較於文野而亦如之야 進進而不已者莫不由於深知自一字之義故也라所以敎育殖產之實際發達이 若不依着於比較競爭之大韓精神則便如滊船之失其滊力며 又如電車之離其電力야 頓無活動進行之熱力리니 凡我會員及同胞 共諒此義야 食息頃刻之間에 毋忘大韓精神이 即所謂回復獨立之大機關乎힌져

dcterms:title: THE FEBRUARY REPOSITORY
dcterms:abstract: THE FEBRUARY REPOSITORY.This interesting number, though a little late in making its appearance, contains its usual quota of readable matter. It leads off with an article on geomancy in which many curious workings of the Korean mind are portrayed. Some of the signs here given are very apropos. For instance if a man is buried in a place like a snake´s tail the children will be tortured and the family become extinct. If he is buried in a place like a rabbit´s head his descendants will be successful in the examinations, and naturally gain official position. We have not infrequently wondered where all the harebrained statesmanship of the world came from, but this explains it. If he is buried in a place like the eye of a Siberian wild-cat it is a bad sign. We should think likely. That a wild goose site is good, however, seems rather paradoxical. This article contains a good deal of food for thought if you examine the kinds of places that are good and compare it with Korean life.Prof. Hulbert gives us an article on the ancient Ru, or marginal helps. It is not easy reading but if one follows out the comparison here made he will see that there is no dodging the conclusion to which the writer comes―namely that the grammatical endings used to-day are those of ancient Silla. He finds thirty-eight striking similarities which cover almost the whole range of verbai and other endings as used to-day. The editor in commenting on it is evidently mistaken when he says Prof. Hulbert meant that the Itu was introduced at or about the the time of Christ. What he meant was evidently that the Chinese character was then introduced. Prof. Hulbert saves himself from too dogmatic a statement by using the words \"effectively introduced,\" which would leave it possible for Kija to have introduce it in the first instance.Mr. Jones contributes a scholarly article on \"Printing and Books in Asia.\" It is intensely interesting and shows a grasp of ◈torical detail and a power of collocating facts that make it the most memorable article that has yet appeared in the Repository during its three of four years of life.We next have an appreciative review of Dr. Dennis´ work entitled \"Christian Missions and Social Progress.\" T◈it title is a striking combination of what had always been supposed to be two very distinct questions and bids fair to be more than a superficial treatment of the subject.Under editorials we find useful facts about the budget for 1898, a translation of the memorial of the Independence Club, fruit in Wonsan and other matters.A review of the valuable life of Dr. Wm J. Hall, and some lively notes and comments close the number
